manzils.text: Jia fu. Yi zunyan de “gulanjing” mengshi,
nandao tamen yin tongzu de jinggao zhe lailin tamen er jing ya ma? Bu xindao de renmen shuo:`Zhe shi qi shi!
Nandao women ji si zhihou, yi bian chentu, hai yao huanyuan ma? Na tai bu jin qinglile.'
Wo que ji zhidao dadi duiyu tamen de boshi, wo zheli youyi ben bei baohu de tian jing.
Tamen fouren yi jiang shi tamen de zhenli, suoyi tamen xianyu hunluan de zhuangtai zhong.
Nandao tamen meiyou yang guan tianti ma? Wo shi zenyang jianzao ta, dianzhui ta, shi ta meiyou quexian de?
Wo ceng zhankai dadi, bing jiang xuduo shanyue tou zai shangmian, hai shi gezhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang chulai,
wei de shi qifa he jiaohui mei ge guiyi de pu ren.
Wo cong yun zhong jiangxia jixiang de yushui, jiu jie ta er shengzhang xuduo guoshu he wugu,
bing shengzhang fushu di hai zao shu, ta you leilei de guoshi,
yong zuo zhong pu de jiyang. Wo jie yushui er shi ta yi si di difang fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo yeshi zheyang de.
Zai tamen zhiqian fouren shizhe de ren, zai nu ha de zongzu, lan si de jumin, sai mo de ren,
a de ren, falao, lu te de tongbao,
conglin de jumin he tu bai de baixing, tongtong dou fourenguo shizhe, guwo suo jinggao de xingfa, shi biran jianglin de.
Wo ceng yin chuangzao er pijuan ma? Buran, tamen duiyu zaizao, shi zai yihuo zhong de.
Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta xinzhong de wangxiang; wo bi ta de mingmai hai jin yu ta.
Dang zuo zai youbian he zuobian de liang ge jilu de tianshen jilu geren de yanxing de shihou,
ta mei shuo yiju hua, ta mianqian dou you tianshen dangchang jiancha.
Linsi de hunmi, jiang zhaoshi zhenli. Zhe shi ni yixiang suo taobi de.
Haojiao jiang chui xiang, na shi jinggao shixian zhi ri.
Mei ge ren dou yao daolai, quzhu de tianshen he jianzheng de tianshen, jiang yu ta tongxing.
Ni que hushi ci shi, xianzai wo yi jie kai ni de mengbi, suoyi ni jinri de yanguang shi ruili de.
Ta de huoban jiang shuo:`Zhe zai wo mianqian shi xiancheng de.'
Nimen lia suo yingdang touru huo yu de, shi mei ge gufu zhe, wangu zhe,
qianlin zhe, guofen zhe, huaiyi zhe,
yi bie de shenling yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai zhe; nimen lia jiang ta touru yanli de xingfa ba!
Ta de huoban jiang shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou shi ta fangdang, dan ta zi xianyu bu jin qingli de mi wu zhong.'
Zhujiang shuo:`Nimen buyao zai wo mianqian zhenglun, wo que yi yuxian jinggao nimenle.
Wo de panci, shi buke biangeng de, wo jue bushi kui wang zhong pu de.'
Zai na ri, wo jiang dui huo yu shuo:`Ni yi tian manle ma?'Ta jiang shuo:`Hai you zengjia de ma?'
Leyuan jiang bei yi dao jingwei zhe de fujin, li de bu yuan.
Zhe shi nimen suo bei yingxu de, zhe shi shangci mei ge guiyi de shou li zhe de.
Mimi jingwei zhiren zhu, qie dai guiyi de xin er lai zhe,
nimen ping'an di jinru leyuan ba! Zhe shi yong ju kaishi zhi ri.
Tamen zai leyuan li, jiang you tamen yiyu de; erqie wo zai nali hai you jia ci.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo huimiele xuduo bi tamen geng qianghan de shidai! Tamen ceng zai gedi luxing, nandao you she me bi si di difang ma?
Duiyu you xinling zhe, huo zhuanxin jing ting zhe, ci zhong que you yizhong jiaoxun.
Wo zai liu rinei que yi chuangzaole tiandi wanwu, wo meiyou ganjue yidian pijuan.
Gu ni yingdang renshou tamen suo shuo de lanyan. Zai ri chu he riluo zhiqian, ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
zai yejian he koutou hou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
Ni yingdang qingting, zai hanjiao zhe cong jin chu hanjiao zhi ri,
zai tamen tingjian baohan zhenli de nahan zhi ri, na shi cong fen zhong chulai zhi ri.
Wo que shi shi rensheng, shi ren si de, wo que shi zuihou de guisu.
Zai dadi polie er tamen xunsu zouchu fenmu zhi ri, na jihe de shi duiyu wo shi rongyi de.
Wo quanzhi tamen suo shuo de lanyan, ni buneng qiangzhi tamen, gu ni yingdang yi “gulanjing” jiaohui weiju wo de jinggao de renmen.
Shi yi bozhong zhe,
zaizhong zhe,
piaoliu zhe,
fenpei zhe,
jinggao nimen de shi que shi zhenshi de,
baoying que shi yao fasheng de.
Yi you guidao de zhu tian mengshi,
nimen que shi ge zhi yi shuo de,
yuan bei zu'e zhe, jiang bei zu'e, er bude daoda ta.
Yuan changchang shuohuang zhe bei qi jue!
Tamen jinchen zai yumei zhi zhong, tamen shi hun kui de.
Tamen wen baoying ri zai shenme shihou,
na shi tamen zai huoxingshang shouxing zhi ri.
Nimen changshi nimen de xingfa ba! Zhe jiushi nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de.
Jingwei de renmen biding zai xuduo leyuan zhong, zai xuduo quanyuan pan,
jieshou tamen de zhu suo shangci de. Tamen zai shengqian que shi xing shan de,
tamen zai yejian zhi shaoshao shui yixia,
tamen zai liming shi xiang zhu qiurao,
tamen de caichan zhong, you qigai he pinmin de quanli.
Zai da dishang duiyu duxin de renmen, you xuduo jixiang;
zai nimen zishen zhong yeyou xuduo jixiang, nandao nimen kan bujian ma?
Zai tianshang, you nimen de jiyang, yeyou yingxu nimen de shangfa.
Yi tiandi de zhu mengshi, zhe que shi zhenshi de, youru nimen neng shuohua yiyang.
Guanyu yi bo la xin de shou youdai de binke de gushi, yi lailin nile ma?
Dangshi, tamen jinqu jian ta, tamen shuo:`Zhu ni ping'an!'Ta shuo:`Zhu nimen ping'an!'Ta xiang zhexie shi sheng ke.
Yushi ta qiaoqiao de zou dao ta de jiashu nali, na lai yitou fei nen de niudu,
ta ba na niudu song dao keren mianqian, shuo:`Nimen zenme bu chi ne!'
Ta wei tamen er xinhuai kongju. Tamen shuo:`Ni buyao kongju.'Tamen yi yige you xueshi de ertong xiang ta baoxi.
Ta de nuren bian hanjiaozhe zou lai, ta da ziji de lian, shuo:`Wo shi yige buneng shengyu de lao furen.'
Tamen shuo:`Ni de zhu shi zheyang shuo de, ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de.'
Ta shuo:`Zhuwei shizhe a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?'
Tamen shuo:`Women que yi feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong,
women jiang yin huimie tamen er jiangxia niantu biancheng de shitou,
na shi cong ni de zhu nali wei guofen zhe er fachu de.'
Wo ba cheng li suoyou de xinshi dou jiule chulai,
wo zai cheng li zhi faxian yijia guishun zhe.
Wo ceng zai cheng li liu xia yizhong jixiang, yibian weiju tongku de xingfa de renmen yong zuo jianjie.
Zai mu sa de gushi li yeyou yizhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng paiqian ta daizhe yi jian mingzheng qu jian falao.
Dan falao yin you shili gu beiqi mu sa, ta shuo:`Zhe shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.'
Suoyi wo chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, er jiang tamen touru haizhong, ta shi shou zebei de.
Zai a de ren de gushi li, yeyouyizhong jixiang. Dangshi, wo ceng shi wuyi de baofeng qu huimie tamen,
fan jing na bao fengchuiguo de dongxi, wu yi bu biancheng posui de.
Zai sai mo de ren de gushi li, yeyou yizhong jixiang. Dangshi, youren dui tamen shuo:`Nimen zhanshi xiangshou ba!'
Tamen ceng weikang tamen zhu de mingling, gu ji lei huimiele tamen, tongshi, tamen yanjian xingfa jianglin,
tamen wei neng zhan qi, tamen ye wei neng ziwei.
Yiqian, wo huimiele nu ha de zongzu, tamen que shi beini de minzhong.
Tian, wo ceng yi quanli jianzao ta, wo que shi da neng de;
de, wo ceng puzhang ta. Meizai puzhang zhe!
Wo jiang mei zhong wu zaocheng pei'ou, yibian nimen juewu.
Ni shuo:`Nimen yingdang tao guizhenzhu, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
Nimen buyao yi bie de shenling yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, wo duiyu nimen que shi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.'
Tamen yiqian de ge minzu ye xiang zheyang, mei you yige shizhe lailin tamen, tamen jiu shuo:`Ta shi yige shushi, huo shi yige feng ren.'
Nandao tamen ceng yi ci hua huxiang zhufu ma? Buran, tamen dou shi beini de minzhong.
Ni yingdang tuibi tamen, ni jue bushi shou zebei de.
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jiaohui duiyu xinshimen que shi youyi de.
Wo chuangzao jingling he renlei, zhi wei yao tamen chongbai wo.
Wo bu wang tamen de gongji, wo ye bu wang tamen de fengyang.
Zhenzhu que shi gongji wanwu de, que shi you quanli de, que shi jianding de.
Buyi de renmen, he tamen de pengyou yiyang, bidei yi fen xingfa, suoyi jiao tamen buyao cuicu wo.
Shang zai bu xindao de renmen! Dang tamen bei jinggao de rizi lailin de shihou.
Yi shanyue mengshi,
yi tian jing zhi shu
xie yu zhankai de pizhi zhe mengshi,
yi zhongren chaojin de tian fang mengshi,
yi bei sheng qi de cangqiong mengshi,
yi wangyang de dahai mengshi,
ni de zhu de xingfa, que shi yao shixian de,
shi renhe ren buneng dikang de.
Zai tianti zhendong,
shanyue shiqu zhi ri,
zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen,
ji yi wangyan xiaoqian de renmen!
Tamen jiang bei touru huo yu.
Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian suo fouren de huoxing.
Zhe shi moshu ne? Haishi nimen kan bujian ne?
Nimen jin huo yu qu ba! Nimen renshou qizhong de xingfa yu fou, sui nimen de fangbian, na duiyu nimen shi yiyang de. Nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou.
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan he enze zhong,
tamen yin zhu de shangci er kuaile, tamen de zhu shi tamen de mian yu liehuo de xingfa.
Nimen yin ziji de xingwei er yukuai di chihe ba!
Tamen kao zai fen lie chengxing de chuangshang, wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi zuo tamen de banlu.
Ziji xindao, zisun ye genzhe xindao zhe, wo jiang shi tamen de zisun yu tamen tongji, wo bu jianshao tamen de shangong yi sihao. Mei ren yingdui ziji de xingwei fuze.
Wo jiang yi tamen suo shihao de shuiguo he roushi gongji tamen,
tamen zai leyuan zhong hu di (jiu) bei, tamen bu yin'er chu e yan, ye bu yin'er fanzui e.
Tamen de tongpu lunliuzhe fushi tamen, naxie tongpu, hao xiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai huxiang tanlun.
Tamen jiang shuo:`Yiqian women wei ziji de jiashu que shi zhanzhanjingjing de,
dan zhenzhu yi shi en yu women, bing shi women de mian yu du feng de xingfa.
Yiqian women dique changchang qidao ta, ta que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.'
Ni yingdang jiaohui zhongren, yinwei jie ni de zhu de endian, ni bushi yige zhanbu zhe, ye bushi yige feng ren.
Buran, tamen shuo:`Ta shi yige shiren, women dengdai ta zaofeng eyun.'
Ni shuo:`Nimen dengdai ba! Wo que shi yu nimen yitong dengdai de.'
Nandao tamen de lizhi mingling tamen shuo zhe ju hua ma? Buran, tamen shi fangdang de minzhong.
Nandao tamen shuo ta ceng niezao ta ma? Buran, qishi shi tamen bu gui xin.
Jiao tamen zuochu xiang zheyang de wenci lai, ruguo tamen shi shuo shihua de!
Shi tamen cong wu dao you bei chuangzao chulai ne? Haishi tamen ziji jiushi chuangzao zhe ne?
Nandao tamen ceng chuangzao tiandi ma? Buran, shi tamen bu quexin zhenzhu.
Shi ni de zhu de kucang gui tamen zhangguan ne? Haishi tamen shi naxie kucang de jiandu ne?
Nandao tamen you yi jia tianti, keyi deng shangqu qingting ma? Jiao tamen zhong de qingting zhe na yige mingzheng lai ba!
Nandao zhen zhu you nu'er, nimen you erzi ma?
Nandao ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, gu tamen wei nashui er danfu tai zhong?
Nandao tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu neng jiang ta jilu xialai?
Nandao tamen yu yong jimou ma? Bu xindao zhe, jiang zi zhong qi ji.
Nandao chu zhenzhu wai, tamen hai you bie de shenling ma? Zhenzhu shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.
Ruguo tamen kanjian tian diao xialai yikuai, tamen jiang shuo:`Zhe shi cheng dui de yuncai.'
Ni ren sui tamen ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu ziji bei zhen si de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen de jimou, duiyu tamen hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu shou yuanzhu.
Buyi de renmen, zai na ri zhiqian, biding yao shou yizhong xingfa, dan tamen daban bu zhidao.
Ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, yinwei ni que shi zai wo de juangu zhi xia de. Ni qilai de shihou, yingdang zansong ni de zhu;
zai yejian he zai xingsu moluo zhihou, ni yingdang zansong ta.
Yi moluo shi de xingsu mengshi,
nimen de pengyou, ji bu mi wu, you wei mixin,
ye wei sui siyu er yan.
Zhe zhishi tasuo shou de qishi,
jiaoshou ta de, shi na qiangjian de,
youli de, gu ta dadao quanmei.
Ta zai dongfang de zuigao chu,
ranhou ta jianjian jiejin er jiangdi,
ta xiangju liang zhanggong de changdu, huo geng jin yixie.
Ta ba tasuo ying qishi de qishi ta de pu ren,
ta de xin meiyou fouren ta suojian de.
Nandao nimen yao wei ta suojian de er yu ta zhenglun ma?
Ta que yi jian ta er ci xiajiang,
zai ji jing de suanzao shu pang,
nali you guisu de leyuan.
Dang suanzao shu meng shang yiceng dongxi de shihou,
yan wei xie shi, ye wei guofen;
ta que yi kanjian ta de zhu de yibufen zuida de jixiang.
Tamen gaosu wo ba! La te he ou sa,
yiji paihang di san, yeshi zui ci de mo na, zenme shi zhenzhu de nu'er ne?
Nandao nanhai gui nimen, nuhai que guizhenzhu ma?
Ran'er, zhe shi bu gongping de fenpei.
Zhexie ouxiang zhishi nimen he nimen de zuxian suoding de mingcheng, zhenzhu bing wei jiayi zhengshi, tamen zhishi ping caixiang he siyu. Zhengdao que yi cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen.
Nandao ren xiwang shenme jiu you she me?
Houshi he jinshi, dou shi zhenzhu de.
Tianshang de xuduo tianshen, tamen de shuo qing, hao wu biyi, chufei zai zhenzhu xuke tamen wei ta suo yiyu he suo xiyue zhe shuo qing zhihou,
buxin houshi de renmen, dique yi nuxing de mingcheng chenghu tian shenmen.
Tamen duiyu na zhong chenghu, jue wu renhe zhishi, tamen zhi ping caixiang; er caixiang duiyu zhenli, que shi hao wu biyi de.
Ni yingdang bi kai na weibei wo de jiaohui, qie zhi yu xiang jinshi shenghuo zhe;
na shi tamen de zhishi chengdu. Ni de zhu, que shi quanzhi beili zhengdao zhe de, yeshi quanzhi zunxun zhengdao zhe de.
Tiandi wanwu, dou shi zhenzhu de. Ta chuangzao wanwu, yibian ta yi zuo'e zhe de xingwei er baochou tamen, bing yizhi shan de pin ji baochou xingshan zhe.

Yuanli dazui he choushi, dan fan xiao zui zhe, ni de zhu que shi kuanyou de. Dang ta cong dadi chuangzao nimen de shihou, dang nimen shi zai mu fu zhong de tai'er de shihou, ta shi quanzhi nimen de; suoyi nimen buyao zicheng qingbai, ta shi quanzhi jingwei zhe de.
Ni gaosu wo ba! Weibei zhengdao,
shaoshao shishe jiu qianlin de ren,
nandao ta zhidao youxuan, gu ren ziji de xingwei wei zhenli ma?
Nandao meiyou ren gaosuguo ta mu sa de jingdian,
he luxing jie ming de yi bo la xin de jingdian zhong suo jizai de shiqing ma?
Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu bieren de zui.
Ge ren zhide xiangshou ziji de laoji;
ta de laoji, jiang bei kanjian,
ranhou ta jiang shou zui wanquan de baochou.
Ni de zhu, shi zhongsheng de guisu.
Ta neng shi ren xiao, neng shi ren ku;
ta neng shi ren si, neng shi rensheng;
ta ceng chuangzao pei'ou ──nanxing de yu nuxing de ──
shi yi shechu de jingye;
ta yi zaizao wei ziji de zeren;
ta neng shi ren fuzu, neng shi ren manyi;
ta shi tianlangxing de zhu.
Ta huimiele gu shi de a de ren,
he sai mo de ren, er weicengyou suo yiliu;
yiqian, ta huimiele nu ha de zongzu. Tamen que shi geng buyi de, que shi geng fangdang de.
Ta shi na bei dianfu de chengshi fuwang,
gu fugai de dongxi ceng fugaile na chengshi.
Ni huaiyi ni de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zhe shi gu shi di naxie jinggao zhe zhi zhong de yige jinggao zhe.
Linjin de shijian, yijing linjinle;
chu zhenzhu wai, meiyou neng jieshi ta de.
Nandao nimen wei zhe xun ci er chayi ma?
Nimen zenme chaoxiao er bu tongku ne?
Nimen shi shuhu de.
Nimen yingdang wei zhen zhu er koutou, yingdang chongbai ta.
Fuhuo shi linjinle, yueliang poliele.
Ruguo tamen kanjian yizhong jixiang, tamen jiu tuibi, erqie shuo:`Zhe shi yizhong youli de moshu.'
Tamen fouren ta, erqie shuncong siyu. Mei yi jian shi dou shi queding de.
Baohan jingjie de xuduo xiaoxi, que yi lailin tamenle,
na shi ji jingmi de zhihui; dan jinggao shi wuxiao de,
gu ni yingdang bi kai tamen. Dang zhaohuan zhe zhao ren yu nanshi de rizi,
tamen bu gan yangshi de you fen zhong chulai, haoxiang shi biandi de huangchong;
Dajia yinjing er ben, qunji yu zhaohuan zhe de mianqian. Bu xindao de renmen jiang shuo:`Zhe shi yige fannan de rizi!'
Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zongzu fourenguo, tamen fourenguo wo de pu ren, tamen shuo:`Zhe shi yige feng ren.'Ta ceng bei he chi,
gu ta qidao ta de zhu shuo:`Wo que shi bei yapo de, qiu ni xiangzhu ba!'
Wo jiu yi qingzhu de yushui kaile xuduo tianmen,
wo you shi dadishang de quanyuan yongchu; yushui he quanshui, jiu yi jiding de zhuangkuang er huihe.
Wo shi ta chengzuo yi zhi yong muban he dingzi zhizao de chuanshang,
zai wo de juangu zhi xia piaoliu, yi baoda bei ren fouren zhe.
Wo que yi jiang zhe jian shi liu zuo yizhong jixiang, you jieshou quangao zhe ma?
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
A de ren fourenguo xianzhi, wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi baofeng zai yige hen xiong'e de rizi qu huimie tamen,
baofeng jiang zhongren ba qi, tamen haoxiang bei ba chu di hai zao shugan yiyang.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Sai mo de ren fourenguo jinggao,
gu tamen shuo:`Women tongzu de yige fanren, women neng shuncong ta ma? Ruguo nayang, women biding xianyu mi wu he fengkuang zhi zhong.
Nandao tamen zai women zhi jian duzi feng dao qishi ma? Buran, ta shi shuohuang zhe, shi aoman zhe.'
Tamen mingri jiang zhidao shui shi shuohuang zhe, shui shi aoman zhe.
Wo biding shi mu tuo kaoyan tamen, gu ni yingdang qidai tamen, bing yingdang jianren,
ni yingdang gaosu tamen, jing shui shi tamen he mu tuo suo jun fen de, ying de shui fen de, lunliuzhe dao jing bian lai.
Tamen ceng han lai tamen de pengyou, ta jiu na qi jian lai zaile mu tuo.
Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
Wo que yi shi yizhong baozha qu huimie tamen, tamen jiu biancheng zao quan lan zhe suoyong de kumu.
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Lu te de zongzu ceng fouren jinggao,
wo que yi shi feishazoushi de baofeng qu huimie tamen; wei lu te de xintu, wo zai liming shi zhengjiule tamen.
Na shi cong wo de zhu nali fachu de endian, wo ruci baochou ganxie zhe.
Ta que yi jiang wo de chengzhi jinggao tamen, dan tamen yi huaiyi de taidu fouren jinggao.
Tamen que yi youhuo ta, jiao ta buyao baohu ta de keren, dan wo tumole tamen de yanjing. Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
Yizhong yongheng de xingfa zai zaochen que yi xijile tamen.
Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu jisong, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Jinggao que yi jianglin falao de baixing,
tamen fourenle wo de yiqie jixiang, guwo yi wanneng zhe quanneng zhe de taidu, chengzhile tamen.
Nimen zhong bu xindao de renmen bi zhe deng ren hai youxiu ne? Haishi tian jing zhong you guanyu nimen de she tiao ne?
Nandao tamen shuo:`Women shi yige changsheng de tuanti.'
Nage tuanti jiang baibei, tamen jiang zhuan bei.
Buran, fuhuo shi shi tamen de yue qi; fuhuo shi shi geng jiannan de, shi geng xinku de.
Fanzui zhe dique zai mi wu he liehuo zhong.
Tamen pufuzhe bei tuo ru huo yu zhi ri, jiang dui tamen shuo:`Nimen changshi huo yu de shaozhuo ba!'
Wo que yi yi dingliang er chuangzao wanwu,
wo de mingling zhishi kuai ru zhuanshun de yiju hua.
Wo que yi jiang nimen de zongpai huimiele. You jieshou quangao de ren ma?
Fan tamen suo zuo de shi, dou jizai zai tian jing zhong.
Yiqie xiaoshi he dashi, dou shi bei jilu de.
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai leyuan li, zai guangming zhong,
zai quanneng de zhu nali, de ju yige ruyi di diwei.
Zhiren zhu,
ceng jiaoshou “gulanjing”,
ta chuangzaole ren,
bing jiao ren xiuci.
Ri yue shi yi ding shu er yunxing de.
Caomu shi shuncong ta de yizhi de.
Ta ceng jiang tian sheng qi. Ta ceng guiding gongping,
yimian nimen yong cheng bugong.
Nimen yingdang binggong di jin shou heng du, nimen buyao shi suo cheng zhi wu fenliang buzu.
Ta wei zhongsheng er jiang da di fangxia.
Da dishang you shuiguo, he you hua bi di hai zao,
yu you gan de wugu he xiangcao.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta ceng yong taoqi ban de gan tu chuangzao ren,
ta yong huoyan chuangzao jingling.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta shi liang ge dongfang de zhu, yeshi liang ge xifang de zhu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta ceng ren liang hai xiangjiao er huihe,
liang hai zhi jian, you yige difang, liang hai hu bu qinfan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ta cong liang haizhong quchu da zhenzhu he xiao zhenzhu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai haizhong wei fan gaoju, zhuang ru shanluan de chuanbo, zhishi ta de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan zai dadishang de, dou yao huimie;
weiyou ni de zhu de benti, juyou zunyan yu da de, jiang yongheng cunzai.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan zai tiandi jian de dou yang qiu ta; ta shi shi dou you shiwu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Jingling he renlei a! Wo jiang zhuanxin yingfu nimen.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Jingling he renlei de qunzhong a! Ruguo nimen neng tongguo tiandi de jingjie, nimen jiu tongguo ba! Nimen bixu pingju yizhong quanbing, caineng tongguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Huoyan he huo yan jiang bei jiang yu nimen, er nimen buneng ziwei.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Dangtian po li de shihou, tian jiang biancheng meigui se, haoxiang hong pi yiyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na ri, renhe ren he jingling dou bu yin zuiguo er shou shenwen.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fanzui zhe jiang yin tamen de xingji er bei renshi, tamen de e fa jiang bei xi zai jiaozhang shang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zhe shi fanzui zhe suo fouren de huo yu.
Tamen jiang wanglai yu huo yu he feishui zhi jian.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Fan pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shou shenwen zhe, dou de xiangshou liang zuo leyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Na liang zuo leyuan, shi you gezhong guoshu de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong liuxing de quanyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, mei zhong shuiguo, dou you liangyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen kao zai yong jinduan zuo li zi de zuo ru shang, na liang zuo leyuan de shuiguo, dou shi shou suo neng ji de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai naxie leyuan zhong, you bu shi feili de qizi; zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren he renhe jingling dou wei yu tamen jiaojieguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen haoxiang hongbaoshi he xiao zhenzhu yiyang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Xingshan zhe, zhi shou shan bao.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Ci yu na liang zuo leyuan de, hai you liang zuo leyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Na liang zuo leyuan dou shi cangcui de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you liang dong yongchu de quanyuan.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai na liang zuo leyuan li, you shuiguo, you hai zao, you shiliu.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai naxie leyuan li, you xuduo xianshu jiali de nuzi.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen shi baixi de, shi zheju yu zhangmu zhong de.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Zai tamen de qi zi zhiqian, renhe ren huo jingling, dou weiceng yu tamen jiaojieguo.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Tamen kao zai cuilu de zuo ru he meili de hua tan shang.
Nimen jiujing fouren nimen de zhu de na yi jian endian ne?
Duo fu zai, ni ju zunyan he da de de zhu de minghao!
Dang na jian dashi fasheng de shihou,
meiyou renhe ren fouren qi fasheng.
Na jian dashi jiang shi neng shi ren jiangji, neng shi ren shengji de;
dang da di zhendang,
shanluan fensui,
hua wei sanman de chen'ai,
er nimen fen wei san deng de shihou.
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Zui xianxing shan zhe, shi zui xianru leyuan de ren.
Zhe deng ren, que shi meng zhu juangu de.
Tamen jiang zai enze de leyuan zhong.
Xuduo qian ren
he shaoshu hou ren,
zai zhubao xiang cheng de chuangta shang,
bici xiangdui di kao zai shangmian.
Changsheng bulao de tongpu, lunliuzhe fushi tamen,
pengzhe zhan he hu, yu man bei de liquan;
tamen bu yin na liquan er toutong, ye bu mingding.
Tamen you ziji suo xuanze de shuiguo,
he ziji suo aihao de niao rou.
Hai you bai zhe de, mei mudi qizi,
haoxiang cang zai bang ke li de zhenzhu yiyang.
Na shi weile baochou tamen de shanxing.
Tamen zai leyuan li, ting bu dao e yan he huanghua,
dan tingdao shuo:`Zhu nimen ping'an! Zhu nimen ping'an!'
Xingfu zhe, xingfu zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Tamen xiangshou wu ci de suanzao shu,
jieshi leilei de xiangjiao shu;
manman de shu yin;
fanfan de liushui;
fengfu de shuiguo,
si shi bu jue, keyi suiyi zhai shi;
yu bei sheng qi de chuangta.
Wo shi tamen chongxin shengzhang,
wo shi tamen chang wei chunu,
yilian zhangfu, bici tong sui;
zhexie dou shi xingfu zhe suo xiangshou de.
Tamen shi xuduo qian ren
he xuduo hou ren.
Boming zhe, boming zhe shi hedeng de ren?
Tamen zai du feng he feishui zhong,
zai hei yan de yinying xia,
ji bu liangshuang, you bu meiguan.
Yiqian tamen que shi haohua de,
que shi guzhi dazui de,
tamen chang shuo:`Nandao women sihou, yibiancheng chentu he kugu de shihou, women biding yao fuhuo ma?
Lian women de zuxian ye yao fuhuo ma?'
Ni shuo:`Qian ren he hou ren,
zai yige zhuming de riqi de teding shijian biding yao bei jihe.
Ranhou mi wu de, fouding fuhuo de renmen a!
Nimen biding shi cuan hu mu de guoshi,
er yi ta chongji,
ranhou tongyin feishui,
xiang hai xiao ke bing de luotuo yin liangshui yiyang.
Zhe shi tamen zai baoying zhi ri suo shou de kuandai.
Wo ceng chuangzao nimen, nimen zen buxin fuhuo ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo she de jingye,
jiujing shi nimen ba ta zaocheng ren ne? Haishi wo ba ta zaocheng ren ne?
Wo ceng jiang siwang fenpei ji nimen, renhe ren buneng zunao wo,
bu rang wo gaibian nimen de pin xing, er shi nimen shengzhang zai nimen suo buzhi de zhuangtai zhong.
Nimen que yi zhidao chuci de shengzhang, nimen zen bu juewu ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo gengzhong de zhuangjia,
jiujing shi nimen shi ta fa rong ne? Haishi wo shi ta fa rong ne?
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi shi ta diaoling, er nimen biancheng chayi zhe,
nimen jiang shuo:`Women shi zao sunshi de.
Buran! Women shi bei boduo de.'
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo yin de shui,
jiujing shi nimen shi ta cong yun zhong jiangxia de ne? Haishi wo shi ta jiangxia de ne?
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo biding shi ta biancheng ku de, nimen zenme bu ganxie ne?
Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo zuan qu de huo,
jiujing shi nimen shi sui mu shengzhang de ne? Haishi wo shi ta shengzhang de ne?
Wo yi ta wei jiaoxun, bingqie yi ta wei huangye de jumin de weiji,
gu nimen yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
Wo bi yi xingsu de moluo chu mengshi,
zhe que shi yige zhongda de mengshi, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
Zhe que shi baogui de “gulanjing”,
jilu zai zhencang de jingben zhong,
zhiyou chunjie zhe cai de fumo na jingben.
“Gulanjing” shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
Nandao nimen miaoshi zhe xun ci,
er yi fouren daiti ganxie ma?
(Nimen) zenme buzai linghun dao jiang sizhe de yanhou de shihou——
na shihou, nimen dajia kanzhe ta,
wo bi nimen geng linjin ta, dan nimen bu xiaode,
ruguo nimen bushi shou baoying de,——
nimen zen bu shi linghun fu fan yu benwei ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.
Ruguo ta shi bei juangu de,
namo, ta jiang xiangshou shushi, jiyang yu enze de leyuan;
ruguo ta shi xingfu zhe,
namo, yiban xingfu de ren jiang dui ta shuo:`Zhu ni ping'an!'
Ruguo ta shi mi wu de, fouren fuhuo zhe,
namo, ta jiang xiangshou feishui de kuandai,
he liehuo de shaozhuo.
Zhe que shi wu ke zhiyi de zhenli.
Gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
Tiandi wanwu, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.
Tiandi de guo quan, gui tasuoyou; ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si; ta duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de.
Ta shi qian wu shi hou wu zhong de, shi ji xianzhu ji yin wei de, ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.

Ta shi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de. Ta zhidao qianru di zhong de, he cong di zhong shengchu de, yu cong tiankong jiangxia de, he sheng shang tiankong de. Wulun nimen zai nali, ta shi yu nimen tong zai de; ta shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de.
Tiandi de guo quan, gui ta suoyou; wanshi zhi guiyu zhenzhu.
Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta shi quanzhi xinshi de.
Nimen yingdang xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe, nimen yingdang fen she ta suo wei nimen dai guan de caichan, nimen zhong xindao erqie shishe zhe, jiang shou zhongda de fu chou.
Nimen zenme bu xinyang zhenzhu ne? Shizhe haozhao nimen qu xinyang nimen de zhu, er nimen de zhu, que yi he nimen diyue, ruguo nimen yao xindao, jiu gankuai xin ba!
Ta jiang shi ta de pu ren xuduo mingzheng, yi bian ta shi nimen cong chongchong hei'an zou ru guangming. Zhenzhu duiyu nimen, que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.

Nimen zenme bu wei zhenzhu er shishe ne? Tiandi de yichan, zhishi zhenzhu de. Nimen zhong zai shengli zhiqian shishe erqie canzhan zhe, yu zai shengli zhihou shishe erqie canzhan zhe, bushi pingdeng de, qianzhe bi houzhe pin ji geng gao. Zhenzhu yi zui you de baochou yingxu mei pai ren, zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
Shui yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu ne? Zhenzhu jiang jiabei changhuan ta, ta hai shou youhou de baochou.

Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen, tamen de guanghui, zai tamen de qianmian he youbian benchi, youren jiang dui tamen shuo:`Nimen jinri de jiayin, shi xia lin zhu he de leyuan; nimen jiang yong ju qizhong, na que shi weida de chenggong.'

Zai na ri, wei xin de nannu, jiang dui xindao de nannu shuo:`Qing nimen denghou women, rang women jie nimen de yidian guanghui!'Youren jiangyao dui tamen shuo:`Nimen zhuan huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba!'Yushi, bici zhi jian, zhu qile yi du gebi lai, gebi shang youyidaomen, men nei you enhui, menwai you xingfa.

Tamen jiang hanjiao xindao de renmen shuo:`Nandao women yu nimen bushi tongdao ma?'Tamen shuo:`Buran, nimen zi qi, guanwang, huaiyi zhengdao, zhongzhong wangxiang, qipian nimen, zhidao zhenzhu de mingling lailin, hua zei ceng yi zhenzhu de yourong qipian nimen.
Gu jinri nimen yu buxindao zhe de fajin, dou bu bei jieshou, nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na duiyu nimen shi geng xiangyi de, na guisu zhen elie!'

Nandao xinshimen yiwei shijian hai wei dao, gu tamen de xin bu wei zhenzhu de jiaohui he tasuo jiang shi de zhenli er rouhe ma? Tamen bu keyi xiang yiqian ceng fengtian jing de renmen nayang, jingguo chang shiqi hou, tamen de xin jiu bian yingle, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi fanzui de.
Nimen yingdang zhidao zhenzhu shi shi yi si de dadi fuhuo de, wo que yi wei nimen jieshile xuduo jixiang, yibian nimen mingli.
Shi cai di shi nu, he yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu di shi nu, ta biding jiabei changhuan tamen, tamen jiang shou youhou de baochou.

Xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe de renmen, zai zhu nali, shi qiancheng zhe, shi jianzheng zhe, tamen jiang you tamen de baochou he guangming. Bu xin zhengdao bingqie fouren wo de jixiang de renmen, shi huo yu de jumin.

Nimen yingdang zhidao: Jinshi shenghuo, zhishi youxi, yule, dianzhui, jinkua, yi caichan he zisun de fushu xiang zhengsheng; piru shiyu, shi tianmiao zizhang, nongfu jianle feichang gaoxing, sihou, tianmiao kugao, ni kan ta biancheng huangse de, ji'er lingluo. Zai houshi, you yanli de xingfa, yeyou cong zhenzhu fachu de she youhe xiyue; jinshi shenghuo, zhishi qipian ren de xiangshou.

Nimen yingdang zhengqu cong nimen de zhu fachu de she you, he yu tiandi yiyang guangkuo de leyuan——wei xinyang zhenzhu he zhong shizhe de renmen er zhunbei de leyuan——na shi zhenzhu de endian, ta jiang ta shangci tasuo yiyu zhe. Zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
Da dishang suoyou de zainan, he nimen ziji suo zao de huohuan, zai wo chuangzao naxie huohuan zhiqian, wu bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; zhe shi duiyu zhenzhu que shi rongyi de,
yimian nimen wei ziji suo sangshi de er beishang, wei tasuo shangci nimen de er kuangxi. Zhenzhu shi bu xi'ai yiqie aoman zhe, jinkua zhe de.
Tamen ziji linse, hai jiao bieren linse. Guibiyiwu de renmen, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu yu tamen de, que shi ke song de.

Wo que yi paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, qu chuanda wo de xuduo mingzheng, bing jiang shi tian jing he gongping, yibian zhongren jin shou gongdao. Wo ceng chuangzao gangtie, qizhong you yanli de xingfa, duiyu zhongren, you xuduo bi yi; yibian zhenzhu zhidao zai mimi zhong xiangzhu ta he ta de zhong shizhe de ren. Zhenzhu que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de.
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha he yi bo la xin, wo yi yuyan he tian jing shangci tamen lia de houyi; tamen zhong you zunxun zhengdao de, tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de.

Zai tamen zhihou, wo ceng jixu paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, wo you jixu paiqian mai er yan zhizi er sa, wo shangci ta “yin zhi lei”, wo shi ta de xintumen xinhuai ren'ai he ci min. Tamen zi chuangchujia zhi——wo weiceng yi chu jia wei tamen de dingzhi——tamen chuangshe ci zhi, yi qiu zhenzhu de xiyue; dan tamen weiceng qieshi de zunshou ta, guwo ba baochou shangci tamen zhong de xindao zhe. Tamen zhong you xuduo ren shi beini de.

Xinyang er sa de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang xinyang ta de shizhe, ta jiu ba ta de enhui jiabei shangci nimen, ta jiu wei nimen chuangzao yi dao guangming; nimen jiang jie na dao guangming er xingzou, ta jiu she you nimen. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

Yibian ceng shou tian jing de renmen zhidao, tamen jianzhi buneng caozong zhenzhu de endian, bingqie zhidao, fan endian dou zai zhenzhu de zhangwo zhong, ta yao shangci shui, jiu shangci shui, zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
Zhenzhu que yi tingqu wei zhangfu er xiang ni biansu, bing xiang zhenzhu suku zhe de chenshule. Zhenzhu tingzhe nimen lia de bianlun; zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de.

Nimen zhong ba qi shi dang muqin de renmen, tamen bushi tamen de muqin; chu tamen de shengshen zhi mu wai, meiyou renhe ren, keyi cheng wei tamen de muqin; tamen dique shuo chu e yan he huanghua; zhenzhu que shi zhi you de, que shi zhi she de.
Ba qizi dangzuo muqin ranhou hui qi suo yan zhe, zai jiaojie zhiqian, yinggai shifang yige nuli. Na shi yong lai quangao nimen de, zhen zhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.

Meiyou nuli zhe, zai jiaojie zhiqian, yinggai lianxu zhaijie liang yue. Buneng zhaijie zhe, yinggai gongji liushi ge pinmin yi ri de kouliang. Zhe yinwei yao nimen biaoshi xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe. Zhexie shi zhenzhu de fadu. Buxin de renmen, jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Weikang zhenzhu he shizhe de ren, bi zao zhemo, youru tamen yiqian de ren ceng zao zhemo yiyang. Wo que yi jiang shi xuduo mingzheng, buxin zhe, jiang shou lingru de xingfa.
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang shi tamen tongtong dou fuhuo, er jiang tamen shengqian de xingwei gaosu tamen. Zhenzhu ceng jilu naxie xingwei, tamen que wangle ta. Zhenzhu shi jianzheng wanwu de.

Nandao ni bu zhidao zhenzhu shi quanzhi tiandi wanwu de ma? Fan yousan geren mitan, ta jiushi di si ge canyu zhe; fan you wu geren mitan, ta jiushi di liu ge canyu zhe; fan you bi na geng shao huo geng duo de ren mitan, wulun tamen zai nali, ta zong shi yu tamen tong zai de; ranhou zai fuhuo ri, ta yao ba tamen de xingwei gaosu tamen. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanwu de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian buxu mitan er weijin mitan de ren ma? Tamen mitan de, shi guanyu zui'e, qinhai he weikang shizhe de shi. Tamen lai jian ni de shi hou, yong zhenzhu suo wei yong de zhuci zhuhe ni, tamen zi yan zi yu de shuo:`Zhenzhu hebu yin women suo shuo dehua er chengfa women ne!'Huo yu shi neng shi tamen manzu de! Tamen jiang ru qizhong, na guisu zhen elie!

Xindao de renmen a! Dang nimen mitan de shi hou, buyao mitan guanyu zui'e, qinhai he weikang shizhe de shi, nimen yingdang mitan guanyu zhengyi he jingwei de shi, nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, nimen jiang bei jihe dao ta nali.
Guanyu zui'e de mitan, zhishi youyu emo de youhuo, ta yu shi xindao zhe youchou, bude zhenzhu de xuke, ta jue buneng shanghai tamen yi sihao; jiao xinshimen zhi xintuo zhenzhu ba.

Xindao de renmen a! Youren zai huichang zhong dui nimen shuo:`Qing nimen tuirang yidian ba!'Nimen jiu yingdang tuirang xie, zhenzhu jiang shi nimen kuanyu. Youren dui nimen shuo:`Nimen qilai ba!'Nimen jiu yingdang qilai, zhenzhu jiang nimen zhong de xindao zhe shengji, bing jiang nimen zhong you xuewen de renmen tisheng ruogan ji. Zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang xian you suo shishe, ranhou cai yu shizhe mitan, zhe duiyu nimen shi geng gaoshang de, shi geng chunjie de. Ruguo nimen wu wu ke shi, name, bu shishe ye wuzui, yin wei zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.

Nandao nimen pa zai mitan zhiqian you suo shishe ma? Nimen meiyou shishe, er zhenzhu yi she you nimen, gu nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wanna tian ke, fucong zhenzhu he shizhe. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de.
Nandao ni meiyou kanjian yu zhenzhu suo qian nu de minzhong jiejiao de renmen ma? Tamen bu shuyu nimen, ye bu shuyu naxie minzhong; tamen mingzhigufan de yi huangyan mengshi.
Zhenzhu yi wei tamen zhunbei yanli de xingfa. Tamen de xingwei zhen elie.
Tamen yi ziji de mengshi wei hufu, yin'er fang'ai zhu dao, gu tamen jiang shou lingru de xingfa.
Tamen de caichan he zisi, dui zhenzhu de xingfa, jue buneng biyi tamen yi sihao. Zhe deng ren, shi huo yu de jumin, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang shi tamen tongtong fuhuo. Tamen dui ta mengshi, youru xianzai dui nimen mengshi yiyang; tamen yiwei ziji shi huode xiaoguo de. Zhen de, tamen que shi shuohuang de.
Emo yijing zhifule tamen, yin'er shi tamen wangque zhenzhu de jiaoxun; zhe deng ren, shi emo de dangyu. Zhen de, emo de dangyu que shi kui she de.
Weikang zhenzhu he shizhe de ren, bi juyu zui beijian de minzhong zhi lie.
Zhenzhu yijing zhiding: Wo he wo de zhong shizhe, biding shengli. Zhenzhu que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de.

Ni bu hui faxian quexin zhenzhu he mori de minzhong, hui yu weikang zhenzhu he shizhe de ren xiangqin xiang'ai, jishi na deng ren shi tamen de fuqin, huo erzi, huo xiongdi, huo qinqi. Zhe deng ren, zhenzhu ceng jiang zhengxin mingke zai tamen de xin shang, bingqie yi cong ta jiangxia de jingshen yuanzhu tamen. Ta jiang shi tamen ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. Zhenzhu xiyue tamen, tamen ye xiyue ta. Zhe deng ren shi zhenzhu de dangyu, zhen de, zhenzhu de dangyu que shi chenggong de.
Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.

Zai chuci fangzhu de shi hou, ta ceng jiang xinfeng “shengjing” er buxin “gulanjing” de ren cong tamen de jiazhong quzhu chujing. Nimen meiyou caixiang dao tamen hui tui chuqu, tamen caixiang ziji de baolei neng fangyu zhenzhu; dan zhenzhu de xingfa, jing cong tamen liao bu dao di difang jianglin tamen. Ta jiang kongbu tou zai tamen de xinzhong, tamen yong ziji de shou he xinshimen de shou chaihui ziji de fangwu. You yanguang de renmen a! Nimen jingti ba!
Jiaruo zhenzhu meiyou panjue tamen ying shou fangzhu, ta bi zai jinshi chengfa tamen; tamen zai houshi, jiang shou huoxing.
Zhe shi youyu tamen weikang zhenzhu he shizhe. Fan weikang zhenzhu zhe, zhenzhu biding chengfa ta, yin wei zhenzhu de xingfa que shi yanli de.
Wulun nimen kanfa hai zao shu, huo ren qi yiran cunzai, dou shi zhenzhu suo yunxu de, ta zhunxu fa shu, yuan wei lingru fangdang zhe.
Fan zhenzhu shou gui shizhe de nichan, nimen dou meiyou han ma zhi lao; dan zhenzhu shi zhong shizhe, zhifu tasuo yiyu zhe; zhenzhu duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de.

Cheng fu de jumin de nichan, fan zhenzhu shou gui shizhe de, dou guizhenzhu, shizhe, zhiqin, gu'er, pinmin he luke, yimian naxie nichan, chengwei zai nimen zhong fuhao zhi jian zhouzhuan de dongxi. Fan shizhe gei nimen de, nimen dou yingdang jieshou; fan shizhe jinzhi nimen de, nimen dou yingdang jiechu. Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi xingfa yanli de.

Naxie nichan yi bu fen gui qian shi zhong de pinmin, tamen ceng bei quzhu chujing, yizhi sangshi ziji de fangwu he caichan. Tamen xunqiu cong zhenzhu fachu de endian he xiyue, tamen xiezhu zhenzhu he shizhe; zhe deng ren, que shi shuo shihua de.

Zai tamen zhiqian, anju guxiang erqie quexin zhengdao de renmen, tamen xi'ai qianju lai de jiao baomen, tamen duiyu naxie jiao bao suo huo de shangci, bu huai yuanhen, tamen sui you jixu, ye yuan ba ziji suoyou de rang gei naxie jiao bao. Neng jiechu zishen de tan lin zhe, cai shi chenggong de.

Zai tamen zhihou daolai de renmen shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women, bing she you zai women zhiqian yijing xindao de jiao baomen, qiu ni buyao rang women yuanhen zai women zhiqian yijing xindao de renmen, women de zhu a! Ni que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.'

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian naxie wei xinzhe ma? Tamen dui ziji de pengyou ──xinfeng “shengjing” er buxin “gulanjing” de renmen, shuo:`Ruguo nimen bei fangzhu, women biding yu nimen yitong chujing, women yong bu fucong renhe ren de mingling er fangqi nimen; ruguo nimen bei gongji, women bi yuanzhu nimen.'Zhenzhu zuo zheng, tamen que shi shuohuang de.
Ruguo tamen bei fangzhu, wei xinzhe bu yu tamen yidao chujing; ruguo tamen bei gongji, wei xinzhe bu yuanzhu tamen; jishi yuanzhu tamen, ye bi zhuanshen taopao, shi zhi bu huo yuanzhu.
Nimen zai tamen de xiongzhong que shi bi zhenzhu hai kepa de, na shi yinwei tamen shi buming li de minzhong.

Tamen zhi zai gonggu de chengshi zhong huo zai baolei hou gongtong zuozhan. Tamen de neizheng shi yanzhong de, ni yiwei tamen shi tuanjie de, qishi, tamen de xin shi huansan de. Na shi yinwei tamen shi buming li de minzhong.
Tamen xiang zai tamen zhiqian gang shiqu de renmen yiyang, tamen yi shang shi tamen xingwei de eguo, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
Tamen you xiang emo yiyang. Dangshi, ta ceng dui ren shuo:`Ni buyao xindao.'Dang ta buxindao de shihou, ta shuo:`Wo que shi yu ni wu gan de, wo dique weiju zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu.'
Tamen lia de jieju, shi tong ru huo yu, er yong ju qizhong; na shi buyi zhe de baochou.
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, ge ren yingdang xiang yi xiang ziji wei mingri er yubeile shenme, nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
Nimen buyao xiang naxie wangque zhenzhu gu zhenzhu shi tamen wangque zishen de renmen yiyang; zhe deng ren, que shi beini de.
Huo yu de jumin yu leyuan de jumin bushi pingdeng de. Leyuan de jumin, que shi chenggong de.
Jiaruo wo ba zhe bu “gulanjing” jiang shi yizuo shan, ni biding kanjian na zuo shan yinweiju zhenzhu er chengwei rouhe de, bengkui de. Zhexie piyu, shi wo wei zhongren er she de, yibian tamen xingwu.
Ta shi zhenzhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi quanzhi youxuan de, ta shi zhiren de, shi zhi ci de.

Ta shi zhenzhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi junzhu. Ta shi zhi jie de, shi jianquan de, shi baoyou de, shi jianzheng de, shi wanneng de, shi zunyan de, shi zunda de. Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta shi chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de.
Ta shi zhenzhu, shi chuangzao zhe, shi zaohua zhe, shi fu xing zhe, ta you xuduo ji meide chenghao, fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong ta, ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao yi wo de diren he nimen de diren wei pengyou, er chuansong xiaoxi gei tamen, yi shi qin'ai. Tamen bu xin jianglin nimen de zhenli, tamen wei nimen xinyang zhen zhu——nimen de zhu——er jiang shizhe he nimen quzhu chujing. Ruguo nimen cong guxiang qian chu, shi youyu wei wo er fendou, shi youyu xunqiu wo de xiyue,(namo, nimen buyao yi tamen wei pengyou). Nimen mimi di chuansong xiaoxi gei tamen, yi shi qin'ai, qishi, wo zhidao nimen suo yinni de he nimen suo xianshi de. Nimen zhong shui zuo zhe jian shi, shui yi beili zhengdao.
Ruguo tamen faxian nimen, tamen jiu biancheng nimen de diren, tamen shahai nimen, ruma nimen, xiwang nimen pan dao.
Nimen de qinqi he zisun, duiyu nimen jue wu biyi, zai fuhuo ri, nimen jiang bei gejue. Zhenzhu shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de.

Yi bo la xin he ta de jiaotu, shi nimen de hao mu fan. Dangshi, tamen ceng dui ziji de zongzu shuo:`Women duiyu nimen, he nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de, que shi wu gan de, women buchengren nimen. Women bici jian de chouhen, yongyuan cunzai. Zhidao nimen zhi xinyang zhenzhu.'Dan yi bo la xin dui ta fuqin suo shuo dehua, buke zuo nimen de mofan. Ta ceng shuo:`Wo biding wei ni qiurao, wo buneng wei ni diyu zhenzhu de yixie xingfa.'Tamen ceng shuo:`Women de zhu a! Women zhi xintuo ni, women zhi yigui ni, zhiyou ni shi zuihou de guisu.
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang bu xindao de ren pohai women. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women, ni que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.'
Yi bo la xin he ta de jiaotu, duiyu nimen xiwang huijian zhenzhu he mori zhe, que shi hao mu fan. Beipan zhe, wusun yu zhenzhu, yin wei zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de.
Zhenzhu huoxu zai nimen he nimen suo choushi de ren zhi jian zaohua youyi, zhenzhu shi quanneng de; zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.

Weiceng wei nimen de zongjiao er dui nimen zuozhan, ye weiceng ba nimen cong guxiang quzhu chujing zhe, zhenzhu bing bu jin zhi nimen lianmin tamen, gongping daiyu tamen. Zhenzhu que shi xi'ai gongping zhe de.
Ta zhi jinzhi nimen jiejiao ceng wei nimen de zongjiao er dui nimen zuozhan, ceng ba nimen cong guxiang quzhu chujing, ceng xiezhu bieren quzhu nimen de ren. Shui yu tamen jiejiao, shui shi buyi zhe.

Xindao de renmen a! Dang xin numen qianyi er lai de shihou, nimen dang shiyan tamen. Zhenzhu shi zhi zhi tamen de xinde de——ruguo nimen renwei tamen que shi xin nu, namo, jiu buyao shi tamen zai gui bu xindao de zhangfu. Tamen duiyu tamen shi bu hefa de, tamen duiyu tamen yeshi bu hefa de. Nimen yingdang ba tamen suo na de pinli changhuan tamen. Dang nimen ba tamen de pinli jiaofu gei tamen de shihou, nimen qu tamen wei qi, duiyu nimen shi hao wuzuiguo de. Nimen buyao jianchi bu xindao de qizi de hunyue, nimen dang suo hui nimen suo na de pinli, jiao tamen ye suo hui tamen suo na de pinli. Zhe shi zhenzhu de lu li, ta yi ci er ti nimen panjue. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.

Ruguo nimen de qizi, you tuoli nimen er gui bu xindao zhe de, namo, dang nimen lun dao jiao pin de shihou, nimen yingdang ba qizi tuoli zhe suo na de pinli jiaofu tamen. Nimen dang jingwei nimen suo xinyang de zhenzhu.

Xianzhi a! Ruguo xin numen dao ni mianqian lai yu ni shiyue: Tamen bu yi renhe wu pei zhenzhu, bu toudao, bu tongjian, bu sha ziji de ernu, bu yi bieren de erzi maochong zhangfu de erzi, bu weibei ni de heli de mingling, namo, ni dang yu tamen shiyue, ni dang wei tamen xiang zhenzhu gaorao. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen buyao jiejiao zhenzhu suo qian nu de minzhong, tamen dui houshi que yi juewang, youru bu xindao de ren dui fen li de ren juewang yiyang.
Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu, ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen weisheme shuo nimen suo bu zuo de shi ne?
Nimen shuo nimen suo bu zuo de, zhe zai zhenzhu kan lai, shi hen kehen de.
Zhenzhu dique xi'ai na deng ren; tamen wei ta er lie zhen zuozhan, haoxiang jianshi de qiang bi yiyang.

Dangshi, mu sa ceng dui ta de zongzu shuo:`Wo de zongzu a! Nimen ji zhidao wo shi zhenzhu pai lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe, nimen weisheme feibang wo ne?'Dang tamen beili zhengdao de shihou, zhenzhu shi tamen de xin beili zhenli; zhenzhu shi bu yindao beini de minzhong de.

Dangshi, mai er yan zhizi er sa ceng shuo:`Yiselie de houyi a! Wo que shi zhenzhu pai lai jiaohua nimen de shizhe, ta pai wo lai zhengshi zai wo zhiqian de “tao la te”, bingqie yi zai wo zhihou dansheng de shizhe, ming jiao ai ha mo de de, xiang nimen baoxi.'Dang ta yi zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng de shihou, tamen shuo:`Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.'
Bieren quan ta ru yisilan, ta que jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao; zheyang de ren, shui bi ta hai buyi ne? Zhenzhu shi bu yindao buyi de minzhong de.
Tamen xiang chui mie zhenzhu de guangming, dan zhenzhuyao wancheng ta de guangming, jishi bu xindao de ren bu yuanyi.
Ta ceng yi zhengdao he zhenjiao de shiming weituo ta de shizhe, yibian ta shi zhenjiao shengguo yiqie zongjiao, jishi yi wu pei zhu de ren bu yuanyi.
Xindao de renmen a! Wo jiang zhishi nimen yizhong shengyi, ta neng zhengjiu nimen tuoli tongku de xingfa, hao ma?
Nimen xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe, nimen yi ziji de caichan he shengming, wei zhen zhu er fendou, na duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao.
Ta jiang she you nimen de zuiguo, bingqie shi nimen ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan he changzhu de leyuan zhong de xuduo youmei de zhuzhai, na que shi weida de chenggong.
Ta jiang shangci nimen ling yizhong wei nimen suo aihao de endian——cong zhenzhu jiangxia de yuanzhu, he linjin de shengli. Ni xiang xinshimen baoxi ba.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen ying dang zuo xiezhu zhenzhu de ren, youru mai er yan zhizi er sa dui ta de mentu suo shuo de:`Shui shi yu wo gongtong xiezhu zhenzhu de?'Naxie mentu shuo:`Women shi xiezhu zhenzhu de.'Yiselie de houyi zhong, you yipai ren yijing xindao, you yipai ren bing buxindao. Wo fuzhu xindao de renmen duikang tamen de diren, gu tamen biancheng yousheng de.
Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong zhenzhu——zhi jie de, wanneng de, zhi rui de junzhu, chaojue wanwu de junzhu.

Ta zai wenmang zhong paiqian yige tongzu de shizhe, qu dui tamen xuandu ta de jixiang, bing peiyang tamen, jiaoshou tamen tian jing he zhihui, jinguan yiqian tamen que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong;
bing jiaohua huan meiyou gan shang tamen de qita ren. Zhenzhu shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
Zhe shi zhenzhu de endian, ta ba ta shangci tasuo yu shangci de renmen, zhenzhu shi you hong en de.
Fengming zunshou “tao la te” er bu zunshou zhe, piru tuo jing de luzi. Fouren zhenzhu de jixiang de minzhong de piyu, zhen elie! Zhenzhu shi bu yindao buyi de minzhong de.
Ni shuo:`Xinfeng youtaijiao de renmen a! Ruguo nimen zicheng shi zhenzhu de xuanmin, er paichi zhongren, na nimen jiu xiwang zaosi ba, ruguo nimen shi chengshi zhe.'
Tamen yinwei cengjing fanguo zui, suoyi yongyuan bu xiwang zaosi. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi buyi zhe de.
Ni shuo:`Nimen suo taobi de siwang, biding yu nimen huimian, ranhou nimen jiang bei song dao quanzhi youming de zhu nali, ta jiang ba nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen.'
Xindao de renmen a! Dang ju li ri zhao ren libai de shihou, nimen yingdang gankuai qu jinian zhenzhu, fangxia maimai, na duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao.
Dang libai wanbi de shihou, nimen dang sanbu zai difang shang, xunqiu zhenzhu de enhui, nimen yingdang duoduo di jinian zhenzhu, yibian nimen chenggong.
Dang tamen kanjian shengyi huo youxi de shihou, tamen lisanle, tamen rang ni duzi zhanzhe. Ni shuo:`Zai zhenzhu nali de, bi youxi he shengyi hai hao, zhenzhu shi zuishan de gongji zhe.'
Dang wei xinzhe lai jian ni de shihou, tamen shuo:`Women zuo zheng, ni que shi zhenzhu de shizhe.'Zhenzhu zhidao ni que shi ta de shizhe, zhenzhu zuo zheng, wei xin de renmen que shi shuohuang de.
Tamen yi ziji de mengshi wei hufu, fang'ai zhu dao. Tamen de xingwei zhen elie!
Zhe shi yinwei tamen koucheng xindao, xin shi bu xin, tamen de xin jiu fengbile, gu tamen bushi mingli de.

Dang ni kanjian tamen de shihou, tamen de tige, jiang shi ni zantan. Ruguo tamen shuohua, ni jiu jing ting tamen de yanci, tamen haoxiang mu'ou yang, tamen yiweiyiqie nahan, dou shi dui tamen er fa de. Tamen que shi diren, gu ni dang jinfang tamen. Yuan zhenzhu zhu mie tamen! Tamen shi ruhe beimiu de ne!
Youren dui tamen shuo:`Nimen lai daoqian ba, shizhe jiang wei nimen qiu jian.'Tamen que diaotou bugu, ni kan tamen wangzizunda, bu ken daoqian.
Ni wei tamen qiu jian yu fou, zhe zai tamen, shi yiyang de. Zhenzhu jue bu she you tamen, zhenzhu biding bu yindao beini de minzhong.
Tamen shuo:`Nimen buyao gongji shizhe zuoyou de ren, yibian tamen lisan.'Tiandi de kucang, zhishi zhenzhu de, wei xin de renmen que buming li.
Tamen shuo:`Ruguo women fanhui mai di na, zun rong zhe bi jiang beijian zhe quzhu chucheng.'Zun rong zhishi zhenzhu he shizhe yiji xinshimen de, er wei xin de renmen que bu zhidao!
Xindao de renmen a! Nimen de caichan he zinu, buyao shi nimen huluele jinian zhenzhu. Shui nayang zuo, shui shi kui she de.

Zai siwang jianglin zhiqian, nimen dang fen she wo ciyu nimen de, fouze, jianglai ren ren shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Ni weihe bu rang wo yanchi dao yige linjin de dingqi, yibian wo you suo shishe, er chengwei shanren ne?'
Dan shou xian yi dao, zhenzhu jue bu rang renhe ren yanchi, zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu. Guo quan zhi gui ta suoyou, zansong zhi gui ta xiangshou, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
Ta ceng chuangzao nimen, dan nimen zhong you bu xindao de, you xindao de; zhenzhu shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de.
Ta ceng benzhe zhenli chuangzao tiandi, ta ceng yi xing xiang fuyu nimen, er shi nimen de xing xiang youmei, ta shi wei yi de guisu.
Ta zhidao tiandi wanwu, ta zhidao nimen suo yinni de he nimen suo biaoxian de, zhenzhu shi quanzhi xinshi de.
Yiqian bu xindao de renmen de xiaoxi, nandao meiyou dadao nimen ma? Na deng ren, ceng changshi tamen de shiqing de eguo, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.

Zhe shi yinwei tamen zu zhong de shizhe xianshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, tamen queshuo:`Nandao fanren ye neng yin dao women ma?'Gu tamen bu xindao er weibei zhi. Zhenzhu ceng biaoshi wu qiu yu tamen de xinyang, zhenzhu shi wu qiu de, shi ke song de.

Bu xindao de renmen, wangyan tamen jue bu fuhuo, ni shuo:`Buran! Yi wo de zhu mengshi, nimen biding fuhuo, ranhou nimen biding huode guanyu nimen de xingwei de baogao, zhe duiyu zhenzhu shi rongyi de.'
Gu nimen dang xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe, he tasuo jiang shi de guangming. Zhenzhu shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.

Zai na ri, ta jiang zai juhui ri jihe nimen; na shi xiang qi zhi ri. Xinyang zhenzhu, erqie xingshan de ren, ta jiang jiechu ta de zui'e, erqie shi ta ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong, na que shi weida de chenggong.
Bu xindao, erqie fouren wo de jixiang de renmen, shi huo yu de jumin, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Na guisu zhen elie!
Fan zainan de fasheng, wu yi bushi yi zhenzhu de panjue de. Shui xin zhenzhu, ta jiang yindao shui de xin, zhenzhu shi quanzhi wanwu de.
Nimen dang fucong zhenzhu, dang fucong shizhe. Ruguo nimen weibei mingling, namo, wo de shizhe, zhi fu mingbai tongzhi de zeren.
Zhenzhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, jiao xinshimen zhi xintuo zhenzhu.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen de qi zi er nu, youyi bu fen que shi nimen de diren, gu nimen dang jinfang tamen. Ruguo nimen shu rao tamen, yuanliang tamen, she you tamen,(zhenzhu jiu she you nimen), yin wei zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Nimen de caichan he zisi, zhishi yizhong kaoyan, zhenzhu nali you zhongda de baochou.
Nimen dang liangli de jingwei zhenzhu, nimen dang tingcong ta de jiaoxun he mingling, nimen dang shishe, na shi youyi yu nimen ziji de. Neng jiechu zishen de tan lin zhe, que shi chenggong de.
Ruguo nimen yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu, ta jiang jiabei changhuan nimen, erqie she you nimen. Zhenzhu shi shan bao de, shi zhi rong de.
Ta shi quanzhi youming de, shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.

Xianzhi a! Dang nimen xiu qi de shihou, nimen dang zai tamen de dai hunqi zhiqian xiu tamen, nimen dang jisuan dai hunqi, dang jingwei zhenzhu——nimen de zhu. Nimen buyao ba tamen cong tamen de fang li quzhu chumen, tamen ye bude ziji chumen, chufei tamen zuole mingxian de choushi. Zhe shi zhenzhu de fadu, shui chaoyue zhenzhu de fadu, shui que shi buyi zhe. Nimen bu zhidao, cihou, zhenzhu huoxu chuangzao yi jian shiqing.

Dang tamen man qi de shihou, nimen dang shanyi di wanliu tamen, huo shanyi di libie tamen. Nimen dang yi nimen de liang ge gongzheng renwei jianzheng, nimen dang wei zhenzhu er zuo zheng. Zhe shi yong lai jiaoxun xinyang zhenzhu he mori zhe de. Shui jingwei zhenzhu, ta jiang wei shui pi yitiao chulu,
erqie cong ta liao xiangbudao di difang gongji ta. Shui xintuo zhenzhu, ta jiang shi shui manzu. Zhenzhu que shi neng dadao ziji de mudi de, zhenzhu dui yi shi wanwu ge you ding shu.

Nimen de funu zhong dui yuejing yi juewang de, ruguo nimen huaiyi, jiu yi san ge yue wei tamen de dai hunqi; hai meiyou yuejing de, yeshi zheyang; huaiyun de, yi fenmian wei man qi. Shui jingwei zhenzhu, ta jiang shi shui shunli.
Zhe shi zhenzhu suo jiang shi nimen de faling, shui jingwei zhenzhu, ta jiang mianchu shui de zui'e, erqie shangci ta zhongda de baochou.

Nimen dang yi ziji de nengli er shi tamen zhu zai nimen suo zhu di difang, nimen buyao fanghai tamen, er shi tamen fanmen. Ruguo tamen you yun, nimen jiu yingdang gongji tamen, zhidao tamen fenmian. Ruguo tamen wei nimen buru, nimen yingdang baochou tamen, bingqie yingdang yi zhengyi er xiang shang. Ruguo nimen de yijian buhe, jiu rang bie de furen wei ta buru.

Jiao fuyu de ren yong ta de fuyu de caichan qu gongji, jiao jiongpo de ren yong zhenzhu suo shangci ta de qu gongji. Zhenzhu zhi yi tasuo fuyu ren de nengli er jiayi zecheng. Zai jiongpo zhihou, zhenzhu jiang gei kuanyu.
You xuduo chengshi de jumin, ceng weikang tamen de zhu he zhong shizhe de mingling, wo jiang yange di shenxun tamen, yanli de chengfa tamen.
Tamen jiang changshi tamen xingwei de eguo, tamen de xingwei de jieju shi kui she de.
Zhenzhu yi wei tamen yubeile yanli de xingfa. Xindao de you lizhi de renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei zhenzhu. Zhenzhu que yi jiang shi nimen yizhong jiaoxun,

bingqie paiqian yi wei shizhe, dui nimen xuandu zhenzhu de xuduo mingxian de jixiang, yibian ta shi xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, tuoli chongchong hei'an, zou ru guangming. Shui xindao erqie xingshan, zhenzhu jiang shi shui ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. Zhenzhu biding shangci tamen youmei de jiyang.
Zhenzhu chuangzaole qi ceng tian, he tongyang ceng shu de dadi, tianming tongguo qi ceng tian er xiajiang, yibian nimen zhidao, zhenzhu duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de, zhenzhu shi zhouzhi wanwu de.
Xianzhi a! Zhenzhu zhunxu ni xiangshou de, ni weisheme jiayi jin jie, yibian xiang ni de qizimen taohao ne? Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
Zhenzhu que yi wei nimen guiding shu shi zhi, zhenzhu shi nimen de baoyou zhe. Ta shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.

Dangshi, xianzhi ba yiju hua mimi de gao xin ta de yige qizi, ta ji zhuangaole bieren, er zhenzhu shi xianzhi zhidao ta de mimi yi bei xielou de shihou, ta shi ta renshi yibufen, er yinni yibufen. Dang ta ji yi xielou gaosu ta de shihou, ta shuo:`Shui baogao ni zhe jian shi de?'Ta shuo:`Shi quanzhi de, che zhi de zhu gaosu wo de.'

Ruguo nimen lia xiang zhenzhu huizui,(namo, nimen lia de huizui shi yingdang de), yinwei nimen lia de xin que yi pianxiangle. Ruguo nimen lia yizhi duifu ta, namo, zhenzhu dui shi ta de baoyou zhe, ji bu li li he xingshan de xinshi, yeshi ta de baohu zhe. Ciwai, zhong tianshen shi ta de fuzhu zhe.

Ruguo ta xiule nimen, ta de zhu huoxu jiang yi shengguo nimen de qizi buchang ta, tamen shi shun zhu de, shi xindao de, shi fucong de, shi huizui de, shi bai zhu de, shi chizhai de, shi zaijiao de he chuhun de.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang wei zishen he jiashu er yufang na yi ren he shi wei ranliao de huoxing, zhuchi huoxing de, shi xuduo canren er yanli de tianshen, tamen bu weikang zhenzhu de mingling, tamen zhixing ziji suo feng de xunling.
Buxindao de renmen a! Jinri, nimen buyao tuoci, nimen zhi shou ziji xingwei de baochou.

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang xiang zhenzhu chengyi huizui, nimen de zhu huoxu mianchu nimen de zui'e, bingqie shi nimen ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan. Zai na ri, zhenzhu bu lingru xianzhi, he yu ta yiqi xindao de renmen. Tamen de guangming, jiang zai tamen de qianmian he youbian benchi, tamen jiang shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wancheng gei women de guangming, qiu ni she you women. Ni duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.'
Xianzhi a! Ni dang yu bu xindao de renmen he wei xin de renmen fendou, ni dang yi yanli de taidu duidai tamen. Tamen de guisu shi huo yu, na guisu zhen elie!

Zhenzhu yi nu ha de qizi he lu te de qizi, wei bu xindao de renmen de yinjian, tamen lia ceng zai wo de liang ge xingshan de pu ren zhi xia, er tamen lia bu zhongyu ziji de zhangfu, tamen lia de zhangfu, wei neng wei tamen lia zhi yu zhenzhu de yidian xingfa. Huozhe jiang shuo:`Nimen lia yu zhongren tong ru huo yu ba!'

Zhenzhu yi falao de qizi, wei xindao de renmen de mofan. Dangshi, ta ceng shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zai ni nali, wei wo jianzhu yi suo fangzi zai leyuan li. Qiu ni zhengjiu wo tuoli falao, he ta de zuixing. Qiu ni zhengjiu wo tuo li buyi de minzhong.'

Zhenzhu you yi yi mu lan de nu'er mai er yan wei xindao de renmen de mofan, ta ceng baoshou zhencao, dan wo yi wo de jingshen chui ru ta de shen nei, ta xin ta de zhu de yanci he tian jing, ta shi yige fucong de ren.
Duo fu zai yongyou zhuquan zhe! Ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
Ta ceng chuangzaole sisheng, yibian ta kaoyan nimen shui de zuowei shi zui youmei de. Ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi she de.
Ta chuangzaole qi ceng tian, ni zai zhiren zhu de suo zaowu zhong, buneng kan chu yidian cenci. Ni zai kan kan! Ni jiujing neng kan chu shenme quexian ne?
Ranhou ni zai kan liang ci, ni de yanjing jiang hunhua di, pijuan di zhuan huilai!
Wo que yi yi zhong xing dianzhui zuijin de tian, bing yi zhong xing gong emomen caice. Wo yi wei tamen yubei huo yu de xingfa.
Bu xin zhu de renmen jiang shou huo yu de xingfa, na guisu zhen elie!
Dang tamen bei touru huo yu de shihou, tamen jiang tingjian feiteng de huo yu fachu lu ming ban de shengyin.
Huo yu jihu wei fennu er posui, mei you yiqun ren bei touru qizhong, guan huo yu de tianshenmen jiu dui tamen shuo:`Nandao meiyou renhe jinggao zhe jianglin nimen ma?'
Tamen shuo:`Buran! Jinggao zhe que yi jianglin womenle, dan women fouren tamen, women shuo:“Zhenzhu meiyou jiang shi shenme, nimen zhi zai zhongda de mi wu zhong.”'
Tamen shuo:`Jiaruo women neng tingcong, huo neng mingli, women bi buzhi lun yu huo yu de jumin zhi lie!'
Tamen chengren tamen de zuiguo. Rang huo yu de jumin yuanli zhenzhu de ci'en!
Zai mimi zhong weiju zhu de renmen, jiang meng she youhe zhongda de baochou.
Nimen keyi yinni nimen de yanyu; ye keyi ba ta shuo chulai. Ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de.
Chuangzao zhe jishi xuanmiao erqie che zhi de, nandao ta bu zhidao nimen suo yinni de yanyu ma?
Ta wei nimen er shi dadi pingwen, nimen yingdang zai dadi de ge fang xingzou, yingdang chi ta de jiyang, nimen fuhuo hou, zhi guiyu ta.
Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi dadi zai zhendang de shihou tunyan nimen ma?
Nandao nimen bupa zai tianshang de zhu shi feishazoushi de baofeng cuihui nimen ma? Nimen jiang zhidao wo de jinggao shi zenyang de.
Zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de renmen, que yi fouren zhong shizhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai tamen de shangmian zhanchi he han yi de zhong niao ma? Zhiyou zhiren zhu weichi tamen, ta que shi mingcha wanwu de.
Chule zhenzhu yuanzhu nimen wai, hai you shui neng zuo nimen de yuanjun ni? Nimen zhi xianyu zi qi zhi zhong.
Shui neng gongji nimen ne? Ruguo zhiren zhu kouliu ta de jiyang. Buran, tamen guzhizhuo jiao'ao he bo ni.
Jiujing shui geng neng huode yindao ne? Shi pufu er xing de ren ne? Haishi zai zheng lushang tingshen er xing de ren ne?
Ni shuo:`Ta shi chuangzao nimen, bing wei nimen chuangzao er, mu he xin de. Nimen que hen shao ganxie.'
Ni shuo:`Ta shi shi nimen fanzhi yu da dishang de, nimen jianglai yao bei jihe dao ta nali.'
Tamen shuo:`Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren.'
Ni shuo:`Guanyu ci shi de zhishi, zhi zai zhu nali, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.'
Dang tamen kanjian zhe yingxu linjin de shihou, buxin de renmen de mianmu jiang biancheng hei de! Huozhe jiang shuo:`Zhe jiushi nimen shengqian wangyan bu hui shixian de shi.'
Ni shuo:`Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo zhenzhu huimie wo, he wo de tongdao, huo lianmin women, namo, shui shi bu xindao de renmen de mian yu tongku de xingfa ne?'
Ni shuo:`Ta shi zhiren zhu, women yi xinyang ta, women zhi xinlai ta. Nimen jiang zhidao shui zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.'
Ni shuo:`Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo nimen de shui yidan shen loule, shui neng gei nimen yitiao liushui ne?'
Nu nai. Yi bi he tamen suo xie de mengshi,
ni wei zhu de endian, ni jue bushi yige feng ren,
ni bidei xiangshou buduan de baochou.
Ni que shi jubei yizhong weida di xingge de.
Ni jiang kanjian, tamen ye jiang kanjian,
nimen jiujing shui shi hai feng bing de.
Ni de zhu dique zhidao shui shi panli ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shui shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de.
Ni buyao shuncong fouren zhenli de renmen,
tamen xiwang ni roushun, tamen ye roushun.
Ni buyao shuncong mei ge wang shi de, beijian de,
shuohuang de, jin chan de,
linse de,guo fen de, fanzui de,
cubi erqie shi sishengzi de ren.
Na shi yinwei ta shi you caichan he zisi de.
Youren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang shi, ta jiu shuo:`Zhe shi guren de gushi.'
Wo jiang zai ta de bizi shang dashang laoyin.
Wo que yi kaoyan tamen, youru kaoyan yuanpu de zhurenmen yiyang. Dangshi, tamen ceng mengshi, tamen biding zai zaochen shouhuo yuanpu zhong de guoshi,
bing bu liu yibufen gei pinmin.
Dang tamen zhengzai shuijiao de shihou, cong ni de zhu fachu de zainan jianglin nage yuanpu,
yidan zhi jian biancheng jiaotu yiyang.
Tamen ceng zai zaochen bici xiang hu:
`Nimen dang zai zaochen dao yuan li qu, ruguo nimen yao xiang shouhuo.'
Tamen zoule, tuzhong qiaoqiao de shangyi shuo:
`Jintian jue buyao rang yige pinmin zou jin yuanpu.'
Tamen zaochen qilai yiwei ziji shi neng ezhi de.
Dang tamen kanjian yuanpu de shihou, tamen shuo:`Women dui shi mi wu de,
buran, women shi bei boduo de!'
Tamen zhong zui youxiu de ren shuo:`Nandao wo meiyou dui nimen shuo ma? Nimen zenme bu zansong zhenzhu ne?'
Tamen shuo:`Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women que shi buyi de.'
Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang zebei qilai.
Tamen shuo:`Shang zai women! Women yuanlai que shi fangdang zhe.
Huoxu women de zhu, yi yige bi zhe hai hao de yuanpu, buchang women, women que shi kenqiu women de zhu de.'
Xingfa jiushi nayang de. Houshi de xingfa que shi geng zhongda de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
Jingwei de renmen, zai tamen de zhu nali, bi jiang xiangshou enze de leyuan.
Nandao wo shi guishun de renxiang fanzui de ren yiyang ma?
Nimen you shenme liyou? Nimen zenme zheyang de panduan ne!
Nandao youyi ben ke gong nimen song xi de tian jing,
zai na ben tian jing li nimen que you ziji suo xuanze de.
Nandao wo ceng yu nimen dijieguo fuhuo ri cai man qi de, jianding de mengyue, yin'er nimen que you nimen suo panduan de?
Ni wen tamen, tamen zhong you shui neng baozheng na jian shi ne?
Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu ma? Jiao tamen ba naxie pei zhu zhaohuan lai, ruguo tamen shi chengshi de ren.
Zai na ri, danan jiang lintou, tamen jiang bei zhao qu koutou, er tamen buneng koutou.
Tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Er guoqu tamen jianquan de shihou, ceng bei zhao qu koutou.
Ni rang wo chengzhi fouren zhe xun ci de ren ba! Wo jiang shi tamen buzhi bu jue de jian qu yu huimie.
Wo yourong tamen, wo de jice que shi zhoumi de.
Ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, jiao tamen danfu tai zhong ne?
Haishi tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu jiayi jilu ne?
Gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, buyao xiang nage zangshen yu fu de ren yiyang. Dangshi, ta aozhe nu huyu ta de zhu;
Jiaruo cong ta de zhu fachu de endian meiyou dadao ta, namo, ta bi shou zebei di bei pao dao huangliang di difang.
Sihou, ta de zhu jianxuanle ta, bing shi ta ru yu shanren zhi lie.
Buxindao de renmen jihu yi tamen de numu shi ni diedao. Dang tamen tingdao xuandu jiaohui de shihou, tamen shuo:`Ta que shi yige fengzi.'
Zhe “gulanjing” bushi bie de, ta shi dui quan shijie de jiaohui.
Zhen zai,
zhen zai shi shenme?
Ni zenme neng renshi zhen zai shi shenme ne?
Sai mo de ren he a de ren, ceng fouren danan.
Zhiyu sai mo de ren ne, yi wei yanxing suo huimie;
zhiyu a de ren, yi wei nuhou de baofeng suo huimie.
Zhenzhu ceng shi baofeng duizhe tamen lian guale qiye ba zhou, ni kan a de ren dao pu zai dishang, haoxiang kongxin di hai zao shugan yiyang.
Ni neng kanjian tamen hai you jieyi ma?
Falao he zai ta zhiqian de ren, yiji bei qingfu de chengshi de jumin, you zai fanzui,
tamen ceng weikang tamen de zhu de shizhe, gu ta yanli chengzhile tamen.
Dang da shui fanlan de shihou, wo rang nimen cheng chuan,
yibian wo yi na jian shi wei nimen de jiaoxun, yibian neng jiyi de erduo ba ta ji zhu.
Dang haojiao yi xiang,
dadi he shanyue dou bei yidong, qie huxiang pengzhuang yici de shihou;
zai na ri, na jian dashi jiang fasheng,
tian jiang polie; zai na ri, tian jiang chengwei cuiruo de.
Zhong tianshen jiang zai tian de ge fang; zai na ri, zai tamen shangmian, jiang you ba ge tianshen, danfu ni de zhu de baozuo;
zai na ri, nimen jiang bei jianyue, nimen de renhe mimi, dou wufa yincang.
Yong youshou jieshou ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:`Nimen na wo de gongguo bu qu du du ba!
Wo que yi caixiang dao wo bi yujian wo de zhangmu.'
Ta jiang zai yukuai de shenghuo li,
zai chonggao de leyuan li,
nalimian de shuiguo shenshou ke de.
`Nimen keyi yukuai di yinshi, yinwei nimen zai guoqu de suiyue zhongxingguo shan.'
Yi zuoshou jieguo ziji de gongguo bu de ren jiang shuo:`Aya! Dan yuan wo meiyou jieguo wo de gongguo bu,
bu zhidao wo ziji de zhangmu!
Dan yuan chenshi de siwang yi liaojie wo de yisheng!
Wo de caichan yu wo hao wu biyi,
wo de quanbing yi cong wo de shouzhong xiaoshi.'
`Nimen zhuo zhu ta, gei ta dai shang jiasuo,
ranhou ba ta tou zai liehuo li,
ranhou ba ta chuan zai yitiao qishi bi zhang de lianzi shang.'
Ta shengqian que shi bu xinyang zunda de zhenzhu,
bu mianli ren zhang ji tan min;
gu jinri ta zai zheli meiyou yige qinqi.
Chu nongzhi wai, ta meiyou shiwu.
Zhiyou mi wu de renmen cai chi nongzhi.
Buran! Wo yi nimen suo nengjian de wanxiang mengshi,
bingqie yi nimen buneng jian de youxuan mengshi,
zhe que shi zungui de shizhe de yanci;
bing bushi shiren de yanci, nimen hen shao xinyang,
ye bushi pu ren de yanci, nimen hen shao juewu.
Zhe shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
Jiaruo ta jiajie wo de mingyi, niezao yaoyan,
wo bi yi quanli daibu ta,
ranhou bi geduan ta de dadongmai,
nimen zhong meiyou yigeren neng baowei ta.
Zhe que shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaoxun.
Wo dique zhidao nimen zhong you fouren de ren.
Zhe duiyu bu xindao de renmen que shi huihen.
Zhe que shi zhenshi de xinnian,
gu ni dang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
Youren ceng qingqiu yizhong jiang fasheng de xingfa.
Na shi wei bu xin de renmen er yuding de, meiyou renhe ren neng jiayi dikang.
Na shi zhenzhu——tianti de zhuzai——fachu de,
zhong tianshen he jingshen zai yi ri zhi nei sheng dao ta na li. Na yi ri de changdu shi wu wan nian.
Ni anran di renshou ba.
Tamen yiwei na xingfa shi hen yuan de,
wo que yiwei na shi hen jin de.
Zai na ri tian xiang rongtong,
shan xiang cai rong.
Qinqi xiang jian bu xiangtong.
Zuiren yuanyi shu qu na ri de xingfa, jishi xisheng ta de ernu,
ta de qizi, ta de dixiong,
he na shourong ta de xuezu,
yiji da dishang suoyou de ren, dan yuan na neng zhengjiu ziji.
Jue buran, na que shi fa yan de liehuo,
neng jie qu toupi,
neng zhaohuan zhuanshen er taobi de ren.
Ta ceng juji caichan er jiayi baocang,
ren que shi bei zaocheng fuzao de,
zaoyu zaiyang de shihou shi fannao de,
huode caifu de shihou shi linse de.
Zhiyou libai de renmen, bushi nayang,
tamen shi chang shou bai gong de;
tamen de caichan zhong you yige ding fen,
shi yong yu shi ji qigai he pinmin de;
tamen shi chengren baoying zhi ri de;
tamen shi weiju tamen de zhu de xingfa de.
Tamen de zhu de xingfa, que shi nanbao bu jianglin de.
Tamen shi baoshou zhencao de,
chufei dui ziji de qizi he nubi, tamen que shi bu yinci er shou zebei de;
fan zai zhege fanwei zhi wai you suo yaoqiu de ren, dou shiguo fen de.
Tamen shi zunzhong ziji suo shou de xintuo, he ziji suo di de mengyue de;
tamen shi binggong zuo zheng de;
tamen shi jin shou bai gong de.
Zhe deng ren, shi zai leyuan zhong shou youdai de.
Bu xindao de renmen, zenme zhushizhe ni, sanwu cheng qun de fen lie
zai ni de zuoyou ne?
Nandao tamen mei geren dou xiwang ru enze de leyuan ma?
Jue buran! Wo que yi yong tamen suo zhidao de wuzhi chuangzaole tamen.
Buran, wo yi yiqie dongfang he xifang de zhu mengshi, wo que shi quanneng de,
wo neng yi bi tamen geng hao de ren daiti tamen, wo bushi wuneng de.
Ni yingdang ren tamen wangtan, ren tamen youxi, zhidao tamen kan dao tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen jiang cong fen zhong chulai benzou, tamen haoxiang ben dao paiwei yiyang,
tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Na shi tamen bei jinggao de rizi.
Wo que yi pai qian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, wo shuo:`Zai tongku de xingfa jianglin ni de zongzu zhiqian, ni dang jinggao tamen.'
Ta shuo:`Wo de zongzu a! Wo que shi nimen de tanshuai de jinggao zhe,
nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu, yingdang jingwei ta, yingdang fucong wo,
ta jiu she you nimen de zuiguo, bingqie rang nimen yanchi dao yige dingqi. Zhenzhu de dingqi yidan lailin de shihou, shi jue bu yanchi de, jiaruo nimen zhidao.'
Ta shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi riye zhaohuan wo de zongzu,
dan wo de zhaohuan shi tamen yujia taobi.
Wo mei ci zhaohuan tamen lai shou ni de she you de shihou, tamen zong shi yi zhitou sai zhu tamen de erduo, yi yifu meng zhu tamen de tou, tamen guzhi er zi da.
Ranhou wo da sheng zhaohuan tamen,
ranhou wo gongkai di xundao tamen, mimi de quan jian tamen,
wo shuo, nimen yingdang xiang nimen de zhu qiurao——ta que shi zhi she de——
ta jiu shi fengzu de yushui jianglin nimen,
bingqie yi caichan he zisi yuanzhu nimen, wei nimen chuangzao yuanpu he heliu.
Nimen zenme bu xiwang zhenzhu de zunzhong ne?
Ta que yijingguo ji ge jieduan chuangzaole nimen.
Nandao nimen meiyou kan dao zhenzhu zenyang chuangzao qi ceng tian,
bing yi yueliang wei guangming, yi taiyang wei mingdeng ma?
Zhenzhu shi nimen cong dadi shengzhang chulai,
ranhou shi nimen zai fan yu dadi, ranhou, you ba nimen cong dadi qu chulai.
Zhenzhu wei nimen er pingzhan dadi,
yibian nimen zai da dishang zouzhe kuankuo de daolu.'
Nu ha shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Tamen que yi weikang wo, tamen shuncong na yin caichan he zisi er gengjia kui she de renmen,
na deng ren ceng dingle yige zhongda de jimou,
tamen shuo:“Nimen jue buyao fangqi nimen de zhong shenming, nimen jue buyao fangqi wang de, su wa er, ye wu si, ye ou ge, nai si er.”
Tamen que yi shi xuduo ren mi wu, qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia mi wu.'
Tamen yinwei ziji de zui'e er bei yan si, sui duo ru huo yu, gu tamen meiyou huode yuanzhu de renmen lai diyu zhenzhu.
Nu ha shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao liu yige bu xindao da zhe zai da dishang,
ruguo ni liu tamen, tamen jiang shi ni de zhong pu mi wu, tamen zhi shengyu bu daode de, bu gan'en de zinu.
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni she you wo he wo de fumu, she you xindao er ru wo de fangwu de ren, yiji xinshimen hexin numen. Qiu ni shi bu yi de renmen gengjia huimie.'
Ni shuo:`Wo ceng feng dao qishi: You ji ge jingling yi jing jing ting, bingqie shuo:“Women que yi tingjian qiyi de “gulanjing”,
ta neng dao ren yu zhengdao, gu women xinyang ta, women jue bu yi renhe wu pei women de zhu.
Zansong women de zhu de zunyan! Chaojue wanwu, ta meiyou ze qu qi shi, ye meiyou ze qu ernu.
Women zhong de yong yu, chang yi beimiu de shi wumie zhenzhu,
women ceng caixiang ren he jingling jue bu wumie zhenzhu.
Ceng you yixie nanren, qiu xie nan jingling baohu tamen, yin'er shi tamen gengjia jiao'ao.
Naxie nanren ceng xiang nimen yiyang caixiang zhenzhu jue bu shi renhe sizhe fuhuo.'
`Women ceng shitan tian, faxian tianshang bu man jianqiang de weishi he canlan de xingsu.
Guoqu, women wei qieting er changchang zuo zai tianshang ke zuo di difang. Xianzai shui qu qieting, shui jiu faxian yi ke canlan de xingsu zai dengzhe ta.
Women bu zhidao, jiujing shi da dishang de wanwu jiang zao huannan ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yin tamen yu zhengdao ne?
Women zhong you shanliang de, you ci yu shanliang de, women shi fen wei xuduo paibie de.
Women xiangxin, women zai da dishang, jue buneng shi zhenzhu wunai, ye jue buneng taobi zhenzhu de qianze.
Dang women tingjian zhengdao de shihou, women yi xinyang ta. Shui xinyang zhu, shui bupa kekou, ye bupa shouru.
Women zhong you shunfu de, you guaizhang de. Fan shunfu de, dou shi youzhiyu zhengdao de.
Zhi yu guaizhang de, jiang zuo huo yu de ranliao.'
Jiaru tamen zunxun zhengdao, wo bi shangci tamen de fengfu de yushui,
yibian wo yi yushui kaoyan tamen. Shui tuibi zhu de jiaoxun, ta jiang shi shui ru zai yanjun de xingfa zhong.
Yiqie qingzhensi, dou shi zhenzhu de, gu nimen yingdang qidao zhenzhu, buyao qidao renhe wu.
Dangzhenzhu de pu ren qilai qidao de shihou, tamen jihu qunqi er gong zhi.
Ni shuo:`Wo zhi qidao wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei ta.'
Ni shuo:`Wo buneng wei nimen zhuchi huofu.'
Ni shuo:`Renhe ren buneng baohu wo bu shou zhenzhu de chengfa; chu zhenzhu wai, wo jue buneng faxian renhe binan suo.
Wo zhi neng chuanda cong zhenzhujiang shi de tongzhi he shiming. Shui weikang zhenzhu he shizhe, shui bi shou huo yu de xingfa, erqie yong ju qizhong.
Dai tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa de shihou, tamen jiu zhidao shui shi geng gua zhu de.'
Ni shuo:`Wo bu zhidao nimen bei jinggao de xingfa shi linjin de ne? Haishi wo de zhu jiang wei ta guiding yige qixian ne?
Ta shi quanzhi youxuan de, ta bu rang renhe ren kuijian ta de youxuan,
chufei tasuo xiyue de shizhe, yinwei ta paiqian weidui, zai shizhe de qianmian he houmian xingzou,
yibian ta zhidao shizhe que yi chuandale tamen de zhu de shiming, bingqie zhouzhi tamen suoyou de yanxing, erqie tongji wanwu de shumu.'
Pi yi de ren a!
Ni yingdang zai yejian libai, chukai bu duo de shijian,
banye huo shao yidian,
huo duo yidian. Ni yingdang fengsong “gulanjing”,
wo biding yi zhuangyan de yanci shouyu ni,
yejian de juexing que shi geng shidang de; yejian de fengsong que shi geng zhengque de.
Ni zai baitian mangyu shiwu,
gu ni yingdang jinian ni de zhu de zun ming, ni yingdang zhuanxinzhizhi de jing shi ta.
Ta shi dongfang he xifang de zhu, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, gu ni yingdang yi ta wei jianhu zhe.
Ni yingdang renshou tamen suo shuo de lanyan, er wenhe de tuibi tamen.
Ni rang wo chuzhi xiangshou anle er fouren zhenli de renmen ba! Ni shaoshao de kuandai tamen ba!
Wo nali que you chenzhong de liao he qianglie de huo,
you ye ren de shiwu, he tongku de xingfa.
Zai na ri, tiandi he shanluan dou yao zhendong, er shanluan jiangyao biancheng yi dui san sha.
Wo que yi paiqian yige shizhe lai jiaohua nimen, erqie dui nimen zuo zheng, youru wo ceng paiqian yige shizhe qu jiaohua falao yiyang.
Dan falao weikangle nage shizhe, guwo yanli de chengzhile ta.
Ruguo nimen bu xindao, namo, nimen zenme fangbei na jiang shi ertong bai fa cangcang de rizi ni?
Tian jiang wei na ri er polie, zhenzhu de yingxu yao shixian de.
Zhe que shi yizhong jiaoxun. Shui yuanyi juewu, shui keyi xuanze yitiao tongda zhu de daolu.

Ni de zhu dique zhidao ni libai de shijian, bu dao quan ye de san fen zhi er, huo er fen zhi yi, huo san fen zhi yi. Ni de tongdao zhong, you yiqun ren yeshi nayang zuo de. Zhenzhu yuding heiye he baizhou de changdu, ta zhidao nimen buneng jisuan ta, gu she you nimen. Nimen yingdang song “gulanjing” zhong jianyi de (wenci). Ta zhidao nimen zhong jiang you yixie bingren, he bie de xuduo ren, huo luxing sifang, xunqiu zhenzhu de enhui; huo wei zhenzhu er zuozhan, gu nimen yingdang fengsong qizhong jianyi de (wenci). Nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wanna tian ke, bing yi shan zhai jie gei zhenzhu. Nimen wei ziji zuo shenme shanshi, dou jiang zai zhenzhu nali dedao geng hao geng da de baochou. Nimen yingdang xiang zhenzhu qiurao, zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
Gai bei de ren a!
Ni yingdang qilai, ni yingdang jinggao,
ni yingdang songyang ni de zhuzai,
ni yingdang xidi ni de yifu,
ni yingdang yuanli wuhui,
ni buyao shi en er qiu hou bao,
ni yingdang wei ni de zhu er jianren.
Dang haojiao bei chui xiang de shihou,
zai na shi, jiang you yige jiannan de rizi.
Nage rizi dui bu xindao de renmen, shi bu rongyi duguo de.
Ni rang wo duzi chuzhi wo suo chuangzao di na geren ba!
Wo shangci ta fengfu de caichan,
he zai genqian de zisi,
wo tigaole ta de shengwang,
er ta hai jiwang wo zai duojia shangci.
Jue buran, ta queshi shi fandui wo de jixiang de,
