wo jiang shi ta zaoshou kunan.
Ta dui yi sikao, que yi jihua.
Dan wulun ta zenyang jihua, ta shi bei qi jue de.
Wulun ta zenyang jihua, ta zhong shi bei qi jue de.
Ta kan yi kan,
ranhou zhoumei cu'e,
ranhou gao'ao di zhuan guo shen qu,
erqie shuo:`Zhe zhishi chuanxi de moshu,
zhe zhishi fanren de yanci.'
Wo jiang shi ta duo ru huo yu,
ni zen neng zhidao huo yu shi shenme?
Ta bu rang renhe wu cunzai, buxu renhe wu liu xia,
ta shaozhuo jifu.
Guanli ta de, gongji shijiu ming.

Wo zhi jiang guanli huo yu de cheng tianshen, wo zhi yi tamen de shumu, kaoyan bu xindao de renmen, yibian ceng shou tian jing de renmen ren qing, er xindao de renmen gengjia duxin; yimian ceng shou tian jing de renmen he xindao de renmen huaiyi; yibian xinzhong you bing zhe he bu xindao zhe shuo:`Zhenzhu she zhege piyu zuo shenme?'Zhen zhu zheyang shi tasuo yiyu de ren wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu de ren zunxun zhenglu. Zhiyou ni de zhu, neng zhidao ta de jundui, zhe zhishi renlei de jiaoxun.
Zhen de, yi yueliang mengshi,
Yi shiqu de heiye mengshi,
yi xian zhao di liming mengshi,
huo yu que shi yige danan,
keyi jinggao renlei,
jinggao nimen zhong yu qianjin zhe huo yu houtui zhe;
geren jiang yin ziji de ying mou er zuo diya,
wei xingfu de renmen chuwai.
Tamen zai leyuan zhong huxiang xunwen,
wen fanzui renmen de qingzhuang,
`nimen weisheme duo ru huo yu ne?'
Tamen shuo:`Women meiyou libai,
ye meiyou jipin,
women yu wangyan de renmen yidao wangyan,
women fouren baoying ri,
yizhi dao siwang jianglinliao women.'
Shuo qing zhe de shuo qing, jiang wuyi yu tamen.
Tamen zenme tuibi zhe jiaoxun ne?
Tamen haoxiang yiqun jinghuang de luzi,
gang taobile yi zhi shizi yiyang.
Buran, tamen zhong de mei ge ren dou xiwang huode yixie zhankai de tian jing.
Jue buran, tamen bu weiju houshi!
Zhen de, zhe “gulanjing” que shi yige jiaohui!
Shui yuanyi, shui jiyi ta,
tamen zhi yin zhenzhu de yiyu er jiyi ta. Ta shi ying shou jingwei de, ta shi yi yu she you de.
Wo yi fuhuo ri mengshi,
wo yi zize de linghun mengshi,
nandao ren caixiang wo jue buneng jihe ta de haigu ma?
Buran,(wo jiang jihe ta de haigu), erqie neng shi ta de mei ge shouzhi fuyuan.
Buran, ren yu chang ci fangdang xiaqu.
Ta wen fuhuo ri zai shenme shihou.
Dang yanmu hunhua,
yueliang hun'an,
ri yue xianghe de shihou,
zai na ri, ren jiang shuo:`Tao dao nali qu ne?'
Jue buran, jue wu renhe binan suo.
Zai na ri, wei ni de zhu nali, you anding zhi suo.
Zai na ri, ge ren jiang bei gaozhi ziji qian qianhou hou zuoguo de shiqing.
Buran, ge ren dui ziji jiushi mingzheng,
jishi ta duofang tuoci.
Ni buyao yaodong ni de shetou, yibian ni cang cu de songdu ta.
Jihe ta he songdu ta, que shi wo de zeren.
Dang wo songdu ta de shihou, ni dang jing ting wo de songdu.
Ranhou jieshi ta, yeshi wo de zeren.
Zhen de, nimen xi'ai xianshi de shenghuo,
er bugu houshi de shenghuo.
Zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi guanghua de,
shi yangshizhe tamen de zhu de.
Zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi chouku de,
tamen quexin ziji bi zao danan.
Zhen de, linghun dadao suogu,
youren shuo:`Shui shi zhu you de?'
Ta quexin na shi libie.
(Si shi) jing yu jing xiang chan jie.
Zai na ri, ta zhi bei qugan dao ni de zhu nali.
Ta meiyou xindao, ye meiyou libai.
Ta fouren zhenli, beiqi zhengdao,
ranhou aoman de zou hui jia qu.
`Huimie yi zhujian de linjin ni.
Huimie yi zhujian de linjin ni.'
Nandao ren caixiang ziji shi bei fangren de ma?
Nandao ta buceng shi bei shechu jingye ma?
Ranhou, ta biancheng xiekuai, er zhenzhu jiayi chuangzao ta, shi zhi chengwei zhiti wanquan de ren ma?
Ta yong jingye zaohua liangxing, nan de he nu de.
Nandao nayang de zaohua zhe buneng shi siren fuhuo ma?
Ren queshi jingli yige shiqi, bushi yi jian keyi jinian de shiwu.
Wo que yi yong hunhe de jingye chuangzao ren, bing jiayi shiyan, jiang ta chuangzao cheng congming de.
Wo que yi zhiyin ta zhengdao, ta huo shi ganxie, huo shi gufu.
Wo que yiwei buxin zhe yubei xuduo tie lian, tie quan he huo yu.
Shan renmen bidei yin hanyou zhangnao de liquan,
ji zhenzhu de zhong pu suo yin de yidao quanshui, tamen jiang shi ta daliang yong chu.
Tamen luxing shiyuan, bing weiju zainan pu jiang ri.
Tamen wei xi'ai zhenzhu er zhenji pinmin, gu'er, fulu.
`Women zhi wei aidai zhenzhu er zhenji nimen, women bu wang nimen de baochou he ganxie.
Women dique weiju cong women de zhu fachu de yanku de yi ri.'
Gu zhenzhu jiang wei tamen fangyu na ri de zainan, bing shangci tamen guanghua he kuaile.
Ta jiang yin tamen de jianren er yi leyuan he sichou baochou tamen.
Tamen zai leyuan zhong, kao zai chuangshang, bu jue yanre, ye bu jue yanhan.
Leyuan de yin ying fu bizhe tamen, leyuan de guoshi, tamen rongyi caizhai.
Jiang youren zai tamen zhi jian chuandi yinpan he boli bei——
jingying ru boli de yinbei, tamen yuding mei bei de rongliang.
Tamen de yong naxie bei yin hanyou jiang zhi de liquan,
ji leyuan zhong youming de qing kuai quan.
Xuduo changsheng bulao de shaonian, lunliuzhe fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian naxie shaonian de shihou, ni yi wei tamen shi xie sanman de zhenzhu.
Dang ni guankan nali de shihou, ni hui kanjian enze he daguo.
Tamen jiang chuanzhuo lingluo jinduan de lu pao, tamen jiang xiangshou yin zhuo de zhuangshi, tamen de zhu, jiang yi chunjie de yinliao shangci tamen.
(Jiang dui tamen shuo:)`Zhe que shi nimen de baochou, nimen de laoji shi you baochou de.'
Wo que yi jiang “gulanjing” lingxing di jiang shi ni,
gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue. Ni buyao shuncong tamen zhong renhe fanzui de ren, huo gu en de ren.
Ni yingdang zhaoxi jinian ni de zhu de zun ming,
Yeli, ni yingdang yi xiao bu fen shijian xiang ta koutou, yi da bu fen shijian zansong ta.
Zhe deng ren dique aihao xianshi, er hushi weilai de yanzhong de yi ri.
Wo chuangzaole tamen, bing shi tamen de tige jianshi. Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang yi xiang tamen yiyang de ren daiti tamen.
Zhe que shi jiaohui, shui yuanyi juewu, shui keyi xuanze yitiao tongda ta de zhu de daolu.
Chu zhenzhu yiyu wai, nimen jue buyiyu. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
Ta shi tasuo yiyu de ren, ru zai ta de ci'en zhong. Zhiyu bu yi de renmen, ta yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa.
Shi yi feng pai chuanda jiayin,
sui menglie chui dong zhe,
shi yi chuanbo ge wu,
er shi zhi fensan,
nai chuanshou jiaoxun zhe,
shi yi shi yuanliang huo jinggao zhe,
jinggao nimen de shi, shi biding fasheng de.
Dang xingsu andan de shihou,
dangtian ti polie de shihou,
dang shanluan feiyang de shihou,
dangzhong shizhe bei dingqi zhaoji de shihou,
qixian zai na ri ne?
Zai panjue zhi ri.
Ni zen neng zhidao panjue zhi ri, shi shenme?
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
Nandao wo meiyou huimie xian min ma?
Ranhou, wo shi hou min sui tamen er xiaomie.
Wo jiang zheyang chuzhi fanzui de ren.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
Nandao wo meiyou yong boruo de jingye chuangzao nimen ma?
Wo ba ta fang zai yige jiangu de anxi zhi suo,
dao yige dingqi.
Wo ceng panding, wo shi shanyu panding de.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
Nandao wo meiyou shi dadi chengwei baoluo
huo wu he si wu de ma?
Wo ceng zai dadishang, anzhi xuduo chonggao de shanluan. Wo ceng shangci nimen ganmei de yinliao.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
`Nimen qu xiangshou nimen suo fouren de xingfa ba!
Nimen qu xiangshou yousan ge quan de yin ying ba!'
Na yin ying bushi yinliang de, buneng zhedang huoyan de relang.
Na huoyan penshe chu gongdian ban de huoxing,
haoxiang lihei de luotuo yiyang.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
Zhe shi tamen bude fayan zhi ri.
Tamen bu meng xuke, gu buneng daoqian.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
Zhe shi panjue zhi ri, wo ba nimen he xian min jihe zai yi chu.
Ruguo nimen you she me jimou, nimen ke dui wo yong ji.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
Jingwei de renmen, biding zai shu yin zhi xia, qingquan zhi bin,
xiangshou tamen ai chi de shuiguo,
jiang dui tamen shuo:`Nimen cengjing xingshan, gu nimen tongkuai di yinshi ba!'
Wo biding zheyang baochou xingshan de renmen.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen.
`Nimen zhanshi chihe xiangshou ba! Nimen que shi fanzui de ren.'
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
Youren dui tamen shuo:`Nimen dang jugong.'Tamen bu ken jugong.
Shang zai fouren zhenli de renmen!
Chu “gulanjing” wai, tamen yao xinyang shenme wenci ne?
Tamen huxiang xunwen, xunwen shenme?
Xunwen na zhongda de xiaoxi,
jiushi tamen suo zhenglun de xiaoxi.
Jue buran! Tamen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
Jue buran, tamen jianglai jiu zhidaole.
Nandao wo meiyou shi da di ru yaolan,
shi shanluan ru mu zhuang ma?
Wo ceng ba nimen zaocheng pei'ou,
wo ceng shi nimen cong shuimian zhong dedao xiuxi,
wo ceng yi heiye wei weimu,
wo yi baizhou gong mousheng,
wo ceng zai nimen shangmian jianzaole qi ceng jiangu de tian,
wo chuangzao yi zhan mingdeng,
wo cong hanshui de yun li, jiangxia pangtuo dayu,
yibian wo jie ta er shengchu bai gu he caomu,
yiji maomi de yuanpu.
Panjue zhi ri, que shi zhiding de riqi,
zai na ri, haojiao jiang bei chui xiang, nimen jiu cheng qun er lai;
tian jiang bei kaipi, you xuduo menhu;
shanluan jiang bei yidong, er biancheng huanying;
huo yu que shi cihouzhe,
ta shi beini zhe de guisu;
tamen jiang zai qizhong douliu changjiu de shiqi.
Tamen zai qizhong buneng shuimian, bude yinliao,
zhi yin feishui he nongzhi.
Na shi yige hen shidang de baochou.
Tamen dique bupa qingsuan,
tamen ceng fouren wo de jixiang,
wo ceng jiang wanshi jilu zai yi ben tian jing li.
(Jiang dui tamen shuo:)`Nimen changshi ba! Wo zhi zengjia nimen suo shou de xingfa.'
Jingwei de renmen bi you yizhong shouhuo,
xuduo yuanpu he putao,
he liang ru yuanrun, nianling huayi de shaonu,
he man bei de liquan.
Tamen zai na limian ting bu dao e yan he huanghua.
Na shi cong ni de zhu fachu de baochou——chongzu de shangci.
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi zhiren de zhu, tamen bu gan xiang ta chen shuo.
Zai jingshen he zhong tianshen pai ban suli zhi ri, tamen bude shuohua, wei zhiren zhu suo texu erqie neng shuo zheng hua de, cai gan fayan.
Na shi bi you de rizi, shui yiyu, shui jiu ze qu yige xiang ta de zhu de guisu.
Wo dique jinggao nimen yizhong linjin de xingfa, zai na ri, geren jiangyao kanjian ziji suo yi zuo de gongzuo, bu xindao de renmen jiangyao shuo:`A! Dan yuan wo yuan shi chentu.'
Shi yi ji che de,
qing ye de,
benchi de,
xianqu de,
juece de,
dang zhendong zhe zhendong,
er xu fa zhe xu fa zhi ri,
zai na ri, xuduo xin jiang tantebu'an,
xuduo yan jiang bu gan yangshi.
Tamen shuo:`Women biding fuyuan ma?
Na shi zai women yibiancheng xiu gu de shihou ma?'
Tamen shuo:`Ranze, na shi yici kui she de fuyuan.'
Na zhishi yici housheng,
tamen huran zai dimian zhi shang.
Mu sa de gushi yi lailin nile ma?
Dangshi, ta de zhu, ceng zai sheng gu du wa zhong zhaohuan ta shuo:
`Ni dao falao nali qu ba! Ta que shi beini de.
Ni dui ta shuo:“Ni yuanyi chengwei chunjie de ren ma?
Ni yuanyi wo yindao ni renshi ni de zhu, er ni weiju ta ma?”'
Ta ba na zuida de jixiang zhaoshile falao,
dan ta fouren, erqie weikang.
Ranhou, ta zhuanshen er benzou.
Yushi, zhaoji minzhong, erqie hanjiao,
shuo:`Wo shi nimen de zhizun de zhu.'
Gu zhenzhu yihou shi he jinshi de xingfa chengzhi ta.
Duiyu weiju de renmen, ci zhong que you yizhong jianjie.
Nimen shi geng nan zao de ne? Haishi tian shi geng nan zao de ne? Ta ceng jianzaole tian,
ta sheng qi ta de gaodu, er chengquan ta de xingti,
ta shi ta de yejian hei'an, bing xian chu ta de guangming.
Cihou, ta jiang dimian zhankai,
ta shi dimian yong chu quanshui lai, shengchu zhiwu lai.
Ta shi shanluan wending,
yi bian nimen he nimen de shengchu huode xiangshou.
Danan lailin de shihou,
jiushi ren jiang ji qi ziji suozuo de shan e,
huo yu jiang wei nengjian de ren xianlu chulai de rizi.
Beini
erqie xuanze jinshi shenghuo de ren,
huo yu bi wei ta de guisu.
Zhiyu pa zhan zai zhu de yuqian shou shenwen, bing jiechu siyu de ren,
leyuan bi wei ta de guisu.
Tamen wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou shixian,
ni zen neng shuoming ta ne?
Weiyou ni de zhu neng zhi ta de jiujing.
Ni de jinggao zhiyou bi yu weiju ta de ren,
tamen zai jian ta di na ri, haoxiang zai fen li zhi douliuguo yi zhao huo yi xi.
Ta ceng zhoumei, erqie zhuanshen li qu,
yinwei nage mangren lai dao ta de mianqian.
Ni zen neng zhidao ne? Ta yexu neng shou xun tao,
huo ting zhonggao, er meng jiaoyi.
Zhiyu ziman zhe,
ni dou fengying ta,
ta bu shou xun tao, yu ni he gan?
Zhiyu yinqie de lai qingjiao ni,
erqie xinhuai jingwei zhe,
ni que daiman ta.
Jue buran! Zhe que shi yizhong jiaoxun.
Shui yu jisong ta, jiu jiao shui jisong ta ba.
Ta zai zhengui de ce ye li;
naxie ce ye, shi bei chengyang de, shi bei di jing de,
shi zai xuduo shuji de shou li de;
naxie shuji, shi zungui de, shi shanliang de.
Gaisi de ren! Ta shi hedeng de wang'en!
Zhenzhu ceng yong shenme chuangzao ta de ne?
Shi yong jingye. Ta ceng chuangzao ta, bing yuding ta fayu de chengxu.
Ranhou, ta shi ta de daolu pingyi.
Ranhou, ta shi ta si, bing anzang ta.
Ranhou, dang ta yiyu de shihou, ta shi ta fuhuo.
Jue buran, ta hai meiyou fengxing tasuo mingling ta de shiwu.
Jiao ren guancha ziji de shiwu ba!
Wo jiang yushui da liang di qingzhu xialai.
Ranhou, wo shi dimian qiyi di lie kai,
wo zai da dishang shengchan bai gu,
yu putao he muxu,
yu zi dun he hai zao,
yu maomi de yuanpu,
shuiguo he mucao,
yi gong nimen he nimen de shengchu xiangshou.
Dang zhen'eryulong de hong sheng lailin de shihou,
zai na ri, ge ren jiang taobi ziji de dixiong,
ziji de fumu,
ziji de qi zi er nu;
zai na ri, ge ren jiang zigubuxia;
zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shi guanghua de,
shi xi xiao de, shi yukuai de;
zai na ri, xuduo mianmu shang, jiang you huichen,
lihei jiang meng wei ta.
Zhe deng ren, shi bu xindao de, shi huangyin de.
Dang taiyang an dan de shihou,
dang xingsu lingluo de shihou,
dang shanluan bengkui de shihou,
dang yun tuo bei paoqi de shihou,
dang yeshou bei jihe de shihou,
dang haiyang pengpai de shihou,
dang linghun bei peihe de shihou,
dang bei huomai de nuhai bei xunwen de shihou:
`Ta weisheme zuiguo er zao shahai ne?'
Dang gongguo bu bei zhankai de shihou,
dangtian pi bei jie qu de shihou,
dang huo yu bei ranzhe de shihou,
dang leyuan bei song jin de shihou,
mei ge ren dou zhidao ta suozuoguo de shan e.
Wo shi yi yunxing de zhong xing——
moluo de xingxing,
he shiqu shi de heiye,
zhaoyao shi de zaochen,
zhe que shi yige zungui de shizhe de yanci,
ta zai baozuo de zhu nali, shi you quanli de, shi you diwei de,
shi zhongwangsuogui, erqie zhongyu zhishou de.
Nimen de pengyou, bushi yige feng ren,
ta que yi kanjian nage tianshi zai mingxian de tianbian,
ta dui youxuan bushi lin jiao de.
Zhe bushi bei fangzhu de emo de yanci,
ranze, nimen jiang wang nali qu ne?
Zhe zhishi duiyu quan shijie de jiaohui——
duiyu nimen zhong yu xunguidaoju zhe de jiaohui,
nimen bu yu xunguidaoju, chufei zhenzhu——quan shijie de zhu——yiyu de shihou.
Dang qiong cang polie de shihou,
dangzhong xing piao duo de shihou,
dang haiyang hunhe de shihou,
dang fenmu bei jie kai de shihou,
mei geren dou zhidao ziji qian qianhou hou suo zuo de yiqie shiqing.
Ren a! Shenme dongxi yinyou ni beilile ni de renci de zhu ne?
Ta ceng chuangzaole ni, ranhou, shi ni jianquan, ranhou, shi ni jun cheng.
Ta yiyu shenme xingshi, jiu yi shenme xingshi er gouzao ni.
Jue buran, dan nimen fouren baoying!
Nimen de shangmian, que you xuduo jianshi zhe,
tamen shi zungui de, shi jilu de,
tamen zhidao nimen de yiqie xingwei.
Shan renmen, bi zai enze zhong;
e renmen, bi zai liehuo zhong.
Tamen jiang zai baoying ri duo ru liehuo,
tamen jue bude likai ta.
Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
Ni zen neng zhidao baoying ri shi shenme?
Zai na ri, renhe ren dui renhe ren buneng you she me biyi; mingling quan guizhenzhu.
Shang zai! Cheng liang bugong de renmen.
Dang tamen cong bieren cheng liang jinlai de shihou, tamen cheng liang de hen chongzu;
dang tamen liang gei bieren huo cheng gei bieren de shihou, tamen bu cheng zu bu liang zu.
Nandao tamen buxin ziji jiang fuhuo,
zai yige zhongda de rizi ma?
Zai na ri, renmen jiang wei quan shijie de zhu er qili.
Jue buran, e renmen de jilu, jiang zai yi ben e xing bu zhong.
Ni zen neng zhidao e xing bu shi shenme?
Shi yi ben fengcun de buzi.
Zai na ri, shang zai fouren de renmen——
fouren baoying ri de renmen!
Zhiyou mei ge guofen de fanzui de ren, fouren ta.
Dang bieren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang de shihou, ta shuo:`Zhe shi guren de gushi.'
Jue buran, dan tamen suo fan de zui'e, yi xiang xiu yang meng bi tamen de xin.
Zhen de, zai na ri, tamen bi shou zulan, bude jinjian tamen de zhu.
Ranhou, tamen bi duo ru liehuo zhi zhong.
Ranhou, huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:`Zhe jiushi nimen suo fouren de.'
Zhen de, shan renmen de jilu, que zai shanxing bu zhong.
Ni zen neng zhidao shanxing bu shi shenme?
Shi yi ben fengcun de buzi,
zhenzhu suo qinjin de tian shenmen jiang zuo zheng ta.
Shan renmen bi zai enze zhong,
kao zai chuangshang zhushizhe,
ni neng zai tamen de mianmu shang renshi enze de guanghua.
Tamen jiang yin fengcun de tian chun,
feng ping kou de, shi shexiang. Jiao tan ai zhe zhong xingfu de renmen, zhengxian wei shan ba!
Tian chun de hunhewu, shi you tai si ni mu lai de,
na shi yi dong quanshui, zhenzhu suo qinjin de ren jiang yin ta.
Fanzui de renmen changchang chaoxiao xinshimen,
dang xinshimen cong tamen de mianqian zouguo de shihou, tamen yi mu huxiang shiyi;
dang tamen hui jia de shihou, yangyang deyi di huiqu;
dang tamen yujian xinshimen de shihou, tamen shuo:`Zhe deng ren que shi mi wu de.'
Tamen meiyou bei pai qu jianshi xinshimen.
Gu jinri xinshimen, chaoxiao bu xindao de renmen,
tamen kao zai chuangshang zhushizhe,
`bu xindao de renmen yi huode tamen de xingwei de baochoule ma?'
Dangtian zhan lie,
tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
dangdi zhankai,
bing pao qi suo huai, erqie bian wei kongxu,
tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
ren a! Ni biding mianli gongzuo, zhidao huijian ni de zhu, ni jiang kan dao ziji de laoji.
Zhiyu yong youshou jieguo gongguo bu zhe,
jiang shou jianyi de jihe,
er xinggaocailie de fan yu ta de jiashu;
zhiyu cong beihou jieshou gongguo bu zhe,
jiang jiaokuliantian,
ru yu liehuo zhi zhong,
congqian ta zai jiashu jian yuan shi kuaile de,
ta yi caixiang ta jue bu hui guiyu zhu.
Buran, ta de zhu, yuan shi jian cha ta de.
Wo yi wanxia mengshi,
yi heiye ji qi baoluowanxiang de mengshi,
yi yuanman shi de yueliang mengshi,
nimen biding zaoyu chongchong de zainan.
Tamen zen neng bu xindao ne?
Dang bieren dui tamen xuandu “gulanjing” de shihou, tamen zenme bu koutou ne?
Buran, bu xindao de renmen, shi fouren zhenli de,
zhenzhu quan zhidao tamen xinzhong yincang de dongxi,
gu ni dang yi yizhong tongku de xingfa xiang tamen baoxi,
wei xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
Shi yi you gong fen de qiong cang,
he suo jinggao de rizi,
yiji neng zheng de he suo zheng de rizi,
yuan jue keng de renmen, bei qi jue,
na keng li you ranliao dianzhe de huo,
dangshi, tamen zuo zai keng bian,
tamen jianzheng ziji dui xinshimen de zuixing,
tamen duiyu xinshimen, zhi zebei tamen xinyang zhenzhu——wanneng de, ke song de zhu,
tiandi de guo quan zhishi ta de, zhen zhu shi jianzheng wanwu de.
Pohai xinshi hexin nu er bu huiguo de renmen, bi shou huo yu de xingfa, bing shou huozai de chengzhi.
Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, bi ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, na que shi weida de chenggong.
Ni de zhu de chengzhi, que shi yanli de.
Ta que neng chuangzao, qie neng zaizao,
ta shi zhi she de, shi zhi ai de,
shi baozuo de zhu, shi zunyan de,
shi weisuoyuwei de.
Ni ceng tingjian jundui de gushile ma?
Falao he sai mo de ren de gushi.
Buran, bu xindao de renmen xianyu fouren zhi zhong,
zhenzhu shi cong ge fangmian baoluo tamen de,
buran, zhe shi zunyan de “gulanjing”,
jilu zai yikuai shou baohu de tian pai shang.
Yi qiong cang he qi mingxing mengshi,
ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenme?
Shi na canlan de mingxing.
Mei geren, dou you yige baohu zhe.
Ren yingdang xiang yi xiang, ta ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de?
Ta shi shechu de jingye zaocheng de.
Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de.
Zhenzhu que shi neng shi ta fuyuan de,
na shi zai yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri.
Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
Yi han yu de yun
he you feng di di fashi,
zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci,
zhe bushi xiaohua.
Tamen biding yao yong jimou,
wo ye yao yong jimou.
Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia.
Ni dang zansong ni zhizun zhu de daming chaojue wanwu,
ta chuangzao wanwu, bing shi ge wu yunchen.
Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao.
Ta shengchu mucao,
ranhou shi ta biancheng heise de kucao.
Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji,
chufei zhenzhu suo yu ni wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing.
Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu,
gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua.
Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu;
boming de ren, jiang tuibi,
ta jiang ru yu dahuo,
ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo.
You jiaoyang de ren que yi chenggong,
ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong.
Buran, nimen que xuanze jinshi de shenghuo;
qishi, houshi shi geng hao de, shi geng jiuzhang de.
Zhe que shi zai zai gu jingdian zhong de,
zai zai yi bo la xin he mu sa de jingdian zhong de.
Da zai de xiaoxi, que yi jianglin nile,
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi gongjing de,
laodong de, xinku de,
tamen jiang ru liehuo,
jiang yin fei quan,
tamen meiyou shiwu, dan you jingji,
ji buneng fei ren, you buneng chongji;
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi xiangfu de,
shi wei qi laoji er yukuai de,
tamen jiang zai chonggao de leyuan zhong,
ting bu dao e yan,
limian you liu quan,
limian you gao ta,
you chenshezhe de bei zhan,
you pailiezhe de kaozhen,
you puzhankai de rongtan.
Nandao tamen bu guancha ma? Luotuo shi zenyang zaocheng de,
tian shi zenyang sheng gao de,
shanluan shi zenyang shu qi de,
dadi shi zenyang zhan kai de.
Ni dang jiaohui, ni zhishi jiaohui (tamen de),
ni jue bushi jiancha tamen de,
dan shui zhuanshen li qu erqie bu xindao,
zhenzhu jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi shui.
Tamen biding zhi guiyu wo,
tamen de jihe, biding you wo fuze.
Shi yi liming,
yu shi ye,
yu oushu he jishu,
yu li qu de heiye,
duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong you yizhong mengshi ma?
Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
you gao zhu de yi lai mu ren ma?
Xiang nayang de ren, zai bie de chengshi li hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo de——
zenyang chengzhi zai shangu li zao shi wei jia de sai mo de ren,
zenyang chengzhi you wuli de falao.
Zhe deng ren ceng zai guozhong fangsi,
nai duo xing buyi,
gu ni de zhu ba yizhong xingfa, qingzhu zai tamen shenshang.
Ni de zhu, que shi jianshi de.
Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu kaoyan ta, gu youdai ta, erqie shi taguo anyi shenghuo de shihou, ta shuo:`Wo de zhu youdai wole.'
Dang ta kaoyan ta, gu jieyue ta de jiyang de shihou, ta shuo:`Wo de zhu lingru wole.'
Jue buran! Dan nimen bu youdai gu'er,
nimen bu yi jipin xiang mianli,
nimen qintun yichan,
nimen ku'ai qiancai.
Jue buran! Dang dadi zhendong fu zhendong,
ni de zhu de mingling, he pai ban de tianshen, tong qi lailin de shihou,
zai na ri, huo yu jiang bei na lai; zai na ri, ren jiang juewu, dan juewu yu ta you he biyi ne?
Ta jiang shuo:`Dan yuan wo zaishi de shihou ceng xing shanshi.'
Zai na ri, renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong xingfa chengzhi bieren;
renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong shufu shufu bieren.
Anding de linghun a!
Ni yingdang xiyue de, bei xiyue de guiyu ni de zhu.
Ni yingdang ru zai wo de zhong pu li;
ni yingdang ru zai wo de leyuan li.
Wo yi zhege difang mengshi——
ni jiang zai nali, bu shou ji shu——
wo yi yige fuqin he tasuo sheng de zisun mengshi,
Wo que yi ba ren chuangzao zai kunan li.
Ta yiwei renhe ren dou buneng zhicai ta ma?
Ta shuo:`Wo huafeile xuduo caichan!'
Ta yiwei renhe ren dou meiyou kanjian ta ma?
Nandao wo meiyou wei ta chuangzao liang zhi yanjing,
yitiao shetou, liang pian zuichun,
bing zhishi ta liang tiao mingxian de daolu ma?
Ta zenme bu chaoyue shan jing ne?
Ni zen neng zhidao chaoyue shan jing shi shenme shi?
Shi shifang nuli,
huo zai jihuang ri zhenji
qinqi de gu'er,
huo kunqiong de pinmin;
tongshi, ta shi yige xindao erqie xingshan, bing yi jianren xiang mian, yi ci min xiangzhu zhe.
Zhe deng ren shi xingfu de.
Buxin wo de jixiang zhe, shi boming de,
tamen jiang bei guan zai huo yu li.
Yi taiyang ji qi guanghui fashi,
yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
yi jieshi taiyang shi de baizhou fashi,
yi longzhao taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
yi cangqiong ji qi jianzhu zhe fashi,
yi dadi ji qi puzhan zhe fashi,
yi linghun jishi ta junheng,
bing qishi ta shan e zhe fashi,
fan peiyang ziji di xingling zhe, biding chenggong;
fan qianghai ziji di xingling zhe, biding shibai.
Sai mo de ren yi yin guofen er fouren zhenli.
Dangshi, tamen zhong zui boming zhe mang shang qian lai,
shizhe jiu dui tamen shuo:`Nimen rang zhenzhu de mu tuo ziyou yinshui ba.'
Dan tamen fouren shizhe er zaisha mu tuo, gu tamen de zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er huimie tamen, shi tamen pubian shounan.
Ta shi bu gulu na zainan de houguo de.
Yi longzhao shi de heiye fashi,
yi xianzhu shi de baizhou fashi,
yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu fashi,
nimen de xingwei, que shi butong de.
Zhiyu zhenji pinmin, jingwei zhenzhu,
qie chengren zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui yi de jieju.
Zhiyu linxi qiancai, zi wei wu qiu,
qie fouren zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui nan de jieju.
Dang ta lunwang de shihou, ta de caichan yu ta you she me biyi ne!
Wo que you zhidao de zeren,
wo que you houshi he jinshi de zhuquan.
Guwo jinggao nimen yizhong fa yan de huo,
wei boming zhe zhui ru qizhong,
ta fouren zhenli, er beiqi zhi.
Jingwei zhe, de mian yu huoxing.
Ta qiancheng de shishe ta de caichan,
ta meiyou shouguo renhe ren de ying bao de ende,
dan ta shishe zhishi weile qiu ta de zhizun zhu de xiyue,
ta ziji jianglai biding xiyue.
Shi yi shangwu,
shi yi heiye, dang qi jijing de shihou,
ni de zhu meiyou qi jue ni, ye meiyou yuanhen ni;
houshi yu ni, que bi jinshi geng hao;
ni de zhu jiang lai bi shangci ni, yizhi ni xiyue.
Nandao ta meiyou faxian ni lingding guku, er shi ni you suo guisu?
Ta ceng faxian ni paihuai qitu, er ba ni yinru zhenglu;
faxian ni jiajing hanku, er shi ni yishi fengzu.
Zhiyu gu'er, ni buyao yapo ta;
zhiyu qigai, ni buyao he chi ta,
zhiyu ni de zhu suo ci ni de endian ne, ni yingdang xuanshi ta.
Nandao wo meiyou wei ni er kaita ni de xiongjin ma?
Wo xie xiale ni de zhongren
ji shi ni de bei danfu guozhong de,
er tigaole ni de shengwang,
yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi,
yu jian nan xiangban de, que shi rongyi,
dang ni de shiwu wanbi shi,
ni yingdang qinlao, ni yingdang xiang ni de zhu kenqiu.
Yi wuhuaguo he ganlan guo mengshi
yi xinai shan mengshi
yi zhege anning de chengshi mengshi
wo que yi ba ren zaocheng juyou zuimei de xingtai
ranhou wo shi ta biancheng zui beilie de
dan xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
Cihou, ni zenme hai fouren baoying ne?
Nandao zhenzhu bushi zui gongzheng de panjue zhe ma?
Ni yingdang feng ni de chuangzao zhu de mingyi er xuandu,
ta ceng yong xiekuai chuangzao ren.
Ni yingdang xuandu, ni de zhu shi zui zunyan de,
ta ceng jiao ren yong bi xie zi,
ta ceng jiao ren zhidao ziji suo bu zhidao de dongxi.
Jue buran, ren que shi beini de,
yinwei ta ziji shi wu qiu de.
Wanwu biding zhi guiyu ni de zhu.
Ni gaosu wo ba!
Nage jinzhi wo de pu ren libai de ren;
ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi zunxun zhengdao de,
huo shi ming ren jingwei de;
ni gaosu wo ba! Ruguo ta shi fouren zhenli, beiqi zhenli de,
nandao ta hai bu zhidao zhenzhu shi jiancha de ma?
Jue buran, ruguo ta bu tingzhi, wo yiding yao zhua zhu ta de e fa——
shuohuang zhe, fanzui zhe de e fa.
Rang ta qu zhaoji ta de huizhong ba!
Wo jiang zhaoji qianghan de tianshen.
Jue buran, ni buyao shuncong ta, ni yingdang wei zhenzhu er koutou, ni yingdang qinjin zhenzhu.
Wo zai na gaogui de yejian que yi jiang shi ta
ni zen neng zhidao na gaogui de yejian shi shenme?
Na gaogui de yejian, shengguo yiqian ge yue
zhong tianshen he jingshen, feng tamen de zhu de mingling, wei yiqie shiwu er zai na yejian jianglin
na yejian quan shi ping'an di, zhidao liming xianzhu de shi hou.
Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe, tamen zhong bu xindao de ren meiyou likai ziji yuan you de xinyang, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen.
Nage mingzheng shi zhenzhu suo paiqian de yige shizhe, ta songdu chunjie de ceye,
qizhong you xuduo zhengque de jing wen.
Xinfeng tian jing zhe, meiyou fen li, zhidao mingzheng lailin tamen.
Tamen zhi fengming chongbai zhenzhu, qiancheng jingyi, ke zun zhengjiao, jin shou bai gong, wanna tian ke, zhe shi zhengjiao.
Xinfeng tian jing zhe he yi wu pei zhu zhe, tamen zhong bu xindao de ren, bi ru huo yu, er yong ju qizhong; zhe deng ren shi zui e de ren.
Xindao er xingshan de ren, shi zuishan de ren,
